translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>命令3：[p/]将\[凯瑟琳·贝尔维瑟\]视为敌对单位，并消灭该对象。</size>

original: THEODORE: …!
translation: THEODORE: ……！

original: THEODORE: Construct![p/][s/] Wipe your-!
translation: THEODORE: 奥术构造体！[p/][s/]清除你的——！

original: ARIA: [i]Hodl[/i]!
translation: ARIA: Hodl！

original: Before he can finish his sentence,[p/] the prosecutor points her cane at the headmaster.
translation: 还没等他说完，[p/]检察官就用自己的手杖指向校长。

original: Magical energy shoots from it and collides directly with him.
translation: 魔法能量从中飞出，直接与他相撞。

original: THEODORE: …!
translation: THEODORE: ……！

original: The magic wreathes around his body and stops him from moving.
translation: 魔法缠绕着校长的身体，使他动弹不得。

original: He’s clearly trying to struggle against it, but it looks like he can’t even move his mouth.
translation: 校长试图挣脱开来，但他貌似连嘴都张不开。

original: JUDGE: M-[p/][s/]Ms. Steelwind?!
translation: JUDGE: 斯、[p/][s/]斯蒂尔文德女士？！

original: ARIA: Excuse the interruption.[p/] Please continue.
translation: ARIA: 抱歉打扰，[p/]请继续。

original: Arcane: COMMAND 4:[p/] AWAIT VOCAL SIGNAL “Leave” FROM \[Theodore Redmond\].
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>命令4：[p/]等待\[西奥多·雷德蒙\]的“离开”声音信号。</size>

original: Arcane: COMMAND 5:[p/] MOVE TO CLASSROOM 2-B. REPLY TO ANY INQUIRIES WITH VOICE LINE #3
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>命令5：[p/]移动至 2-B 讲堂，过程中使用预设声音 #3 回复一切询问。</size>

original: Arcane: COMMAND 6:[p/] REMOVE \[Catherine Bellwether\] FROM INTERIOR FRAME AND PLACE ON FLOOR.
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>命令6：[p/]将\[凯瑟琳·贝尔维瑟\]从内部取出并放置于地上。</size>

original: TYRION: Thank you, Construct.
translation: TYRION: 奥术构造体，感谢你的陈述。

original: TYRION: You can stop now.[p/] I think we all know the rest.
translation: TYRION: 你可以停止运行了，[p/]我想剩下的我们都知道了。

original: TYRION: But just to be clear.[p/] Who gave you this series of commands?
translation: TYRION: 但有一点请你说清楚，[p/]是谁给予你这一系列的命令的？

original: Arcane: COMMANDS WERE PROVIDED BY Headmaster \[Theodore Redmond\].
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>命令由校长\[西奥多·雷德蒙\]所提供。</size>

original: THEODORE: How…?[p/][s/] HOW?!
translation: THEODORE: 怎么可能……？[p/][s/]<size=1.5em>这怎么可能？！</size>

original: THEODORE: I ordered the Construct to wipe its command history!
translation: THEODORE: 我命令过奥术构造体清除它的历史记录！

original: TYRION: Mr. Redmond,[p/] Constructs don’t follow the same logic that humans do.
translation: TYRION: 雷德蒙先生，[p/]构造体和人类的逻辑思维不同。

original: TYRION: They’re prone to error when their commands are impossible to execute.
translation: TYRION: 当命令不可能执行时，它们就很容易出错。

original: THEODORE: “Impossible”?![p/][s/] In [i]what[/i] way were my commands impossible?!
translation: THEODORE: “不可能”？！[p/][s/] 我给的命令<u>怎么</u>会不可能执行？！

original: TYRION: You were the one that [i]made[/i] it impossible.
translation: TYRION: <u>导致</u>命令无法执行的正是你自己。

original: TYRION: You activated the lockdown system.
translation: TYRION: 你激活了学院的封锁系统。

original: THEODORE: The lockdown…?
translation: THEODORE: 封锁系统……？

original: TYRION: The body was found earlier than you’d like.
translation: TYRION: 尸体被发现的时间早于你的计算。

original: TYRION: You had no choice but to immediately activate the lockdown system when it was reported.
translation: TYRION: 你别无他法，只能在案件被通报时立即激活封锁系统。

original: TYRION: However,[p/][s/] the Construct was still in the Locker Room when you did this.
translation: TYRION: 然而，[p/][s/]当时奥术构造体还在储物柜室里。

original: THEODORE: So [i]that’s[/i] why it was there…
translation: THEODORE: 原来<u>这</u>就是为什么它在那……

original: TYRION: The Construct finished its tasks in the Locker Room.[p/] …But then it tried to follow your next command.
translation: TYRION: 奥术构造体完成了在储物柜室里的任务。[p/]……但之后它试图进行下一项指令。

original: TYRION: It tried to move to the Storage Room.[p/] But it was prevented from doing so.
translation: TYRION: 它试图移动至储藏室，[p/]但因封锁无法行动。

original: TYRION: Completion of that command was impossible.
translation: TYRION: 这一项指令不可能完成。

original: TYRION: So,[p/] the series of commands was stopped [i]before[/i] it wiped its history.
translation: TYRION: 所以，[p/]指令的执行停止在了清除历史记录<u>之前</u>。

original: THEODORE: You little-!
translation: THEODORE: 你这小——！

original: TYRION: Theodore Redmond![p/][s/] You ordered your Construct to murder Catherine Bellwether.
translation: TYRION: 西奥多·雷德蒙！[p/][s/]你命令奥术构造体杀害凯瑟琳·贝尔维瑟。

original: TYRION: Then you had it place the murder weapon in a locker to frame Miriam Frega!
translation: TYRION: 之后命令其将凶器放在储物柜里，试图陷害米莉亚姆·弗雷加！

original: TYRION: And we have your Construct’s testimony to prove it!
translation: TYRION: 我们有奥术构造体的证言来证实这一切！

original: TYRION: …And that’s checkmate.
translation: TYRION: ……将军。

original: ARIA: I…[p/] can’t believe it…
translation: ARIA: 我……[p/]真是难以置信……

original: ARIA: How could you do something like this, headmaster?
translation: ARIA: 校长！你为什么会做这种事？

original: THEODORE: …She was going to take everything from me.
translation: THEODORE: ……她要夺走我的一切。

original: THEODORE: My position…[p/] My academy…[p/] My students…
translation: THEODORE: 我的职位……[p/]我的学院……[p/]我的学生们……

original: THEODORE: Everything would be gone.[p/][s/] It was going to be [i]stolen[/i] by her and the Fregas!
translation: THEODORE: 我的一切都将化为乌有。[p/][s/]这一切都会被她和弗雷加家族的人<u>偷走</u>！

original: ARIA: I…
translation: ARIA: 我……

original: Aria: Why didn’t you say anything to me…?
translation: Aria: 为什么你要瞒着我……？

original: ARIA: I could have-
translation: ARIA: 我本能——

original: THEODORE: Don’t you [i]dare[/i] stand there and act ignorant, Lady Steelwind!
translation: THEODORE: 少站在那装无辜了！斯蒂尔文德小姐！

original: THEODORE: Do you think the Fregas acted alone?!
translation: THEODORE: 你以为弗雷加家是单独行事的吗？！

original: THEODORE: Your [i]father[/i] was a part of this plot too!
translation: THEODORE: 你<u>父亲</u>也参与了这个阴谋！

original: ARIA: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: ARIA: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: THEODORE: I have nothing to say to you.
translation: THEODORE: 我和你没什么好说的。

original: THEODORE: I thought you were different.[p/] I listened to your lies about societal reform.
translation: THEODORE: 我本以为你不一样。[p/]我听信了你关于社会改革的谎言。

original: THEODORE: In the end,[p/] you were just like the rest of the aristocracy...
translation: THEODORE: 到头来，[p/]你和那些贵族没什么两样……

original: ARIA: …
translation: ARIA: ……

original: THEODORE: By the Scaled Lord…[p/] What have I done?
translation: THEODORE: 鳞甲领主在上……[p/]我到底做了什么？

original: THEODORE: I was even willing to sacrifice poor Wallace…
translation: THEODORE: 我甚至甘愿去牺牲可怜的华莱士……

original: THEODORE: I can’t believe I…
translation: THEODORE: 我真不敢相信……

original: THEODORE: Why did I listen to
translation: THEODORE: 我当初为什么要听

original: Theodore: Why did I do this?
translation: Theodore: 我为什么要干这件事？

original: JUDGE: …It appears we have a full confession.
translation: JUDGE: ……看来已经全盘招供了。

original: JUDGE: The court sees no reason to prolong this any further.
translation: JUDGE: 法庭认为没有理由再继续拖延此案。

original: JUDGE: Bailiff,[p/] please escort the witness to a holding cell.
translation: JUDGE: 法警，[p/]请押送证人到拘留所。

original: WALLACE: Mr. Cuthbert![p/][s/] You…[p/][s/] You really did it!
translation: WALLACE: 卡斯伯特先生！[p/][s/] 你……[p/][s/]你真的做到了！

original: CELESTE: It feels amazing, right?[p/] Like a big weight being lifted from your shoulders.
translation: CELESTE: 感觉如梦似幻对吧？[p/]一种如释重负的感觉。

original: WALLACE: It does,[p/] but…
translation: WALLACE: 确实是这样，[p/]但……

original: WALLACE: I can’t believe the headmaster was the one who did this…
translation: WALLACE: 我真的没法相信校长竟然是幕后黑手……

original: Right…[p/] Despite everything Redmond did,[p/] [i]he[/i] was the one that allowed Wallace to pursue his dreams.
translation: 没错……[p/]抛开雷德蒙做的这些事，[p/]<u>他</u>也是那个允许华莱士追逐梦想的人。

original: TYRION: I’m sorry…[p/] I’m sure this is bittersweet for you.
translation: TYRION: 深感抱歉……[p/]我知道这一切对你来说很不是滋味。

original: WALLACE: What am I going to do now…?
translation: WALLACE: 我现在该怎么办呢……？

original: WALLACE: Headmaster Redmond was the only reason I could even [i]attend[/i] the academy.
translation: WALLACE: 我能在学院<u>上学</u>都是因为雷德蒙校长。

original: WALLACE: With him gone…
translation: WALLACE: 他不在了的话……

original: CELESTE: C-[p/][s/]Come on![p/][s/] Don’t think like that!
translation: CELESTE: 没、[p/][s/]没事的！[p/][s/]别那样想！

original: CELESTE: You got acquitted![p/][s/] I’m sure it’ll all work out!
translation: CELESTE: 你已经被无罪释放了！[p/][s/]我相信那些事总有办法的！

original: You want to agree, but…[p/] [b]necromancy[/b] is basically taboo.
translation: 你很想同意她，但……[p/][b]死灵术[/b]从根本上来说还是禁术。

original: Without Redmond’s support,[p/] there aren’t many places he [i]could[/i] learn it legitimately.
translation: 没有了雷德蒙的支持，[p/]世上可没多少<u>能</u>合法供他学习的地方。

original: And then there’s the Imperial Academy…
translation: 还有帝国学院的事……

original: CELESTE: H-[p/]Hey,[p/][s/] don’t [i]you[/i] get all sad on me too!
translation: CELESTE: 喂、[p/]喂，[p/][s/]<u>你</u>别和他一样消沉呀！

original: TYRION: Sorry…[p/] I was just thinking.
translation: TYRION: 抱歉……[p/]我刚刚在想事情。

original: TYRION: With Redmond gone…[p/] The Fregas will probably just appoint another sycophant as the headmaster.
translation: TYRION: 雷德蒙离开之后……[p/]弗雷加家估计会委派另一个贵族的马屁精来担任校长的职位。

original: TYRION: Valentina,[p/] Valerie,[p/] and Jan.[p/] They’re all going to lose their jobs.
translation: TYRION: 瓦伦蒂娜，[p/]瓦莱丽，[p/]还有简。[p/]他们都要丢掉工作了。

original: CELESTE: Come on![p/][s/] You found the truth [i]and[/i] you put a murderer behind bars!
translation: CELESTE: 别想这些啦！[p/][s/]你找到了真相，<u>还</u>把真凶送进了监狱！

original: CELESTE: You saved Wallace!
translation: CELESTE: 你救了华莱士！

original: Ruby: She's right.
translation: Ruby: 她说得对。

original: As you start to exit the courtroom,[p/] you're greeted by Ms. Tymora.
translation: 走出法庭，[p/]泰摩拉女士便来打招呼。

original: Was she in the gallery this entire time?
translation: 她这次也一直在旁听席吗？

original: Ruby: At the end of the day,[p/] you saved Wallace from a wrongful conviction.
translation: Ruby: 今天，[p/]你将华莱士从冤罪中解救出来。

original: Ruby: You should be proud of yourself for that.
translation: Ruby: 你应该为自己自豪。

original: TYRION: …
translation: TYRION: ……

original: TYRION: I suppose you’re right.[p/] Maybe I [i]am[/i] just overthinking things.
translation: TYRION: 你说得没错，[p/]或许我想太多了。

original: But the doubt still lingers in your mind.
translation: 但疑团仍旧萦绕在脑海中。

original: CELESTE: Now come on![p/] I’m taking Wallace to that restaurant we went to last time.
translation: CELESTE: 好啦！[p/]我打算带华莱士去上次的那个餐厅。

original: TYRION: Do you…[p/] remember how much that place cost?
translation: TYRION: 你难道……[p/]忘了上次我们花了多少钱吗？

original: CELESTE: Don’t worry.[p/] I have plenty of gold.
translation: CELESTE: 没事的没事的，[p/]我很有钱。

original: TYRION: …Am I the only one on this team not making any gold?
translation: TYRION: ……我是这里唯一一个没赚到任何钱的人吗？

original: Ruby: …Why don't you meet us there, Celeste?
translation: Ruby: ……我们就在那汇合吧，塞莱斯特。

original: Ruby: I need to talk with Tyrion for a moment.
translation: Ruby: 我有些话想和提利昂聊聊。

original: Celeste: Alright.
translation: Celeste: 好的。

original: Celeste: Let's go, Wallace!
translation: Celeste: 我们走吧，华莱士！

original: Wallace: U-[p/][s/]Um...[p/] Okay...
translation: Wallace: 唔、[p/][s/]嗯……[p/]好的……

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: ...You activated the Empowered Eye again, didn't you?
translation: Ruby: ……你又一次用了强化之眼对吧？

original: She doesn't appear to be praising you...
translation: 听起来不像是在夸奖你……

original: Tyrion: I-[p/]I did...
translation: Tyrion: 是、[p/]是的……

original: Tyrion: I didn't really have a choice...
translation: Tyrion: 我当时没有别的选择……

original: Ruby: The Eye of Horus is a powerful tool, Tyrion.
translation: Ruby: 荷鲁斯之眼是个强大的工具，提利昂。

original: Ruby: But that's twice now that you've used the Empowered Eye to get out of a tough spot.
translation: Ruby: 但你已经两次利用强化之眼来脱离困境了。

original: Ruby: You can't keep relying on it if you want to grow as an attorney.
translation: Ruby: 一直依赖它的话，你作为律师也难以成长。

original: Ruby: One day,[p/] you'll find a witness that the Empowered Eye [i]won't[/i] work on.
translation: Ruby: 总有一天，[p/]你会遇到一个连强化之眼都<u>无法</u>洞察的证人。

original: Tyrion: It's worked for me this far, though...
translation: Tyrion: 可到目前为止都能生效……

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Tyrion: B-[p/][s/]But I suppose you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 但、[p/][s/]但你说得没错。

original: Tyrion: I'll try to rely on it less next time...
translation: Tyrion: 我下次会尽力少依赖它的……

original: TYRION: And that marked the end of another case in my career as a defense attorney.
translation: TYRION: 这标志着我辩护律师生涯中另一个案件的结束。

original: TYRION: Another life saved.[p/] And another murderer brought to justice.
translation: TYRION: 又拯救了一条无辜的性命，[p/]又一名凶手被绳之以法。

original: TYRION: …But I still couldn’t shake this feeling of uneasiness.
translation: TYRION: ……但我仍无法摆脱这种不安的感觉。

original: TYRION: Was it guilt for what would happen to the faculty staff?
translation: TYRION: 是因为想到了学院教职员工们的未来吗？

original: TYRION: …Or was it something else?
translation: TYRION: ……还是说因为其他的事？

original: KNIGHT: Man…[p/] Steelwind has been talking with the perp for hours.
translation: KNIGHT: 呃啊……[p/]斯蒂尔文德已经审讯罪犯好几个小时了。

original: KNIGHT: What’s there to even ask at this point?
translation: KNIGHT: 都这种时候了还有什么可问的？

original: Orym: Turns out she doesn't trust his testimony.
translation: Orym: 因为归根究底，她不相信校长的证言。

original: Orym: Something about his memories not matching up with the crime scene.
translation: Orym: 他记忆中的部分内容与犯罪现场不符。

original: Knight: You don't think he has Mageblight, does he?
translation: Knight: 你说他该不会是患上法师之疫了吧？

original: ORYM: No,[p/] it's not [i]that[/i].
translation: ORYM: 不是，[p/]不是<u>那个</u>。

original: Orym: *sigh*[p/] She found that damned symbol etched into his desk.
translation: Orym: *叹气* [p/]她发现校长的桌子下刻着那个该死的记号。

original: ORYM: Or what did she call it?[p/] The "Purple Mark”?
translation: ORYM: 她管这东西叫什么来着？[p/]“紫色标记”？

original: KNIGHT: Oh,[p/] for the love of-[p/] Not [i]this[/i] again…
translation: KNIGHT: 哦，[p/]天呐——[p/]怎么又是<u>这个</u>……

original: ORYM: Look.[p/] If the little lady wants to chase the boogeyman,[p/] just let her.
translation: ORYM: 听着，[p/]如果那位亲爱的小姐打算调查恶魔，[p/]那就让她去吧。

original: ORYM: At least this time,[p/] she’s doing it personally instead of dragging us into it.
translation: ORYM: 至少这次，[p/]她没把我们拖下水。

original: ERIS: Cast [b]Sleep[/b]…
translation: ERIS: 施展[b]睡眠术[/b]……

original: ORYM: H-[p/][s/]Hey!
translation: ORYM: 喂、[p/][s/]喂！

original: ORYM: What’s…[p/] up…[p/] with…?
translation: ORYM: 发生……[p/]什么……[p/]了……？

original: ARIA: [i]Who[/i] did this to your desk?
translation: ARIA: <u>是谁</u>在你桌上刻的这个标志？

original: THEODORE: What has gotten [i]into[/i] you?!
translation: THEODORE: 你到底是<u>怎么</u>了？！

original: THEODORE: I’ve already admitted to everything!
translation: THEODORE: 我已经认罪了！

original: THEODORE: What [i]more[/i] could you possibly want from me?!
translation: THEODORE: 你还想从我这<u>知道什么</u>？！

original: ARIA: Where did this graffiti come from?!
translation: ARIA: 这涂鸦到底是哪来的？！

original: ARIA: What is this symbol?![p/][s/] What is the Purple Mark?!
translation: ARIA: 这是什么符号？！[p/][s/]这个紫色标记是什么意思？！

original: THEODORE: I-[p/][s/]I don’t know![p/][s/] A student must have done it at some point!
translation: THEODORE: 我、[p/][s/]我不知道！[p/][s/]肯定是哪个学生画的！

original: ARIA: Think very hard, headmaster!
translation: ARIA: 好好想想！校长！

original: ARIA: When did you receive this purple symbol?!
translation: ARIA: 你到底是什么时候收到这个紫色标记的？！

original: ARIA: Focus on the moment you received this!
translation: ARIA: 集中注意力，回忆你收到这个的瞬间！

original: THEODORE: …
translation: THEODORE: ……

original: THEODORE: I…
translation: THEODORE: 我……

original: THEODORE: Wait…
translation: THEODORE: 等下……

original: THEODORE: Wait a minute!
translation: THEODORE: 等等！

original: THEODORE: I remember it now!
translation: THEODORE: 我记起来了！

original: THEODORE: But how-?!
translation: THEODORE: 但是怎么——？！

original: ARIA: …
translation: ARIA: ……

original: THEODORE: Lady Steelwind…?
translation: THEODORE: 斯蒂尔文德小姐……？

original: THEODORE: Lady Steelwind!
translation: THEODORE: 斯蒂尔文德小姐！

original: THEODORE: Aria![p/][s/] What happened?![p/][s/] Are you okay?!
translation: THEODORE: 阿莉亚！[p/][s/]发生什么事了？！[p/][s/]你还好吗？！

original: Eris: That was close.
translation: Eris: 好险。

original: Eris: My elation over meeting him almost made me forget.
translation: Eris: 见到他的喜悦差点都让我忘了这件事。

original: THEODORE: Eris…[p/][s/] What are you doing here?!
translation: THEODORE: 厄莉斯……[p/][s/]你在这儿干什么？！

original: THEODORE: W-[p/][s/]Why…?
translation: THEODORE: 为、[p/][s/]为什么……？

original: THEODORE: …
translation: THEODORE: ……

original: THEODORE: Wait…[p/][s/] I remember now!
translation: THEODORE: 等下……[p/][s/]我记起来了！

original: THEODORE: It was you![p/][s/] You put those ideas into my mind!
translation: THEODORE: 是你！[p/][s/]是你把这些想法灌输给我的！

original: THEODORE: [i]You’re[/i] the one who told me to murder Bellwether!
translation: THEODORE: <u>你</u>才是那个让我杀害贝尔维瑟的人！

original: Eris: Oh...[p/] You humans never fail to amuse me.
translation: Eris: 哦……[p/]你们这些人类真是擅长取悦我。

original: Eris: I didn’t [p/][s/]“[i]make[/i]” you do anything.
translation: Eris: 我没有[p/][s/]<u>让</u>你做任何事。

original: Eris: Everything you did that day,[p/] all the planning,[p/] all the preparation.
translation: Eris: 那天你的所作所为，[p/]所有计划，[p/]所有事先准备。

original: Eris: That came from your [i]own[/i] mind.
translation: Eris: 都是你<u>自己</u>的意志和思考。

original: Eris: And I have to say,[p/] I was quite entertained with the scheme you came up with.
translation: Eris: 说实话，[p/]你布的局给了我不少乐子。

original: Eris: Why you even broke into Miriam’s room!
translation: Eris: 你甚至闯进了米莉亚姆·弗雷加的房间！

original: Eris: I didn’t know you had it in you, old man!
translation: Eris: 没想到你还有这个胆子，老头！

original: THEODORE: You…[p/][s/] made me forget about our conversation![p/][s/] But, how?!
translation: THEODORE: 是你……[p/][s/]让我忘记我们之前的对话！[p/][s/]但是，怎么可能？！

original: THEODORE: [b]Illusions[/b] can’t affect the mind![p/][s/] [i]Magic[/i] can’t affect the mind!
translation: THEODORE: 没有一种[b]幻象术[/b]能影响人的心智！[p/][s/]所有<u>魔法</u>都不可能！

original: Eris: Hm…[p/] It’s a shame, though.
translation: Eris: 哼嗯……[p/]不过蛮遗憾的。

original: Eris: I would have much rather turned Wallace into the antagonist of this chapter.
translation: Eris: 我本想把华莱士变成这章的大反派的。

original: Eris: Could you imagine if [i]he[/i] turned?[p/] It would have been spectacular.
translation: Eris: 你能想象如果<u>他</u>是幕后黑手的景象吗？[p/]那场面一定十分壮观。

original: Eris: Armies of the undead,[p/] running rampant in the streets.
translation: Eris: 不死人的军团，[p/]在大街小巷上横行。

original: Eris: But alas,[p/] even [i]I[/i] couldn't corrupt his pure soul.
translation: Eris: 不过，唉，[p/]即便是<u>我</u>也没办法腐化他纯洁的灵魂。

original: THEODORE: Answer me![p/][s/] Who are you?![p/][s/] [i]What[/i] are you?!
translation: THEODORE: 回答我的问题！[p/][s/]你到底是谁？！[p/][s/]你到底是什么<u>东西</u>？！

original: Eris: Who am [i]I[/i]…?
translation: Eris: <u>我</u>是谁……？

original: Eris: I’m the Lord of the Sixth Circle.
translation: Eris: 我乃第六环之主。

original: THEODORE: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
translation: THEODORE: 噶啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！

original: It's an extravagant bed.
translation: 这是一张华丽的床。

original: It looks like Miriam lives pretty well here.
translation: 看起来米莉亚姆在这儿过的不错。

original: It's a dresser.[p/] It probably contains Miriam's clothes.
translation: 一个衣柜。[p/]里面大概放着米莉亚姆的衣服。

original: …It would probably be a bad idea to take a closer look with Miriam here.
translation: ……也许不该当着米莉亚姆的面往里看。

original: It's a table for guests.
translation: 一张客人用的桌子。

original: ...But it doesn't look like it's seen much use until now.
translation: ……但好像直到我们来之前，都没怎么用过。

original: TYRION: Ms. Frega.[p/] I was wondering if we could ask you some questions about-
translation: TYRION: 弗雷加女士，[p/]请问我可以问您一些问题吗——

original: MIRIAM: Excuse me?[p/] I don’t believe anyone has permitted you to speak.
translation: MIRIAM: 不好意思，[p/]还没有人允许你发言吧。

original: Oh, here we go…
translation: 唉，又来了……

original: CSteel: …
translation: CSteel: ……

original: Celeste is still smiling but you can faintly hear her grinding her teeth together.
translation: 塞莱斯特面上依旧保持微笑，但你隐约听到她咬牙切齿。

original: CSteel: …S-[p/]So,[p/] we heard about what happened to Professor Bellwether.
translation: CSteel: ……所、[p/]所以，[p/]我们听说了贝尔维瑟教授的事。

original: CSteel: I can’t believe it.
translation: CSteel: 令人难以置信。

original: MIRIAM: Yes…[p/] It’s quite tragic what happened to her.
translation: MIRIAM: 是的……[p/]她的遭遇十分不幸。

original: MIRIAM: She has always been an acquaintance of House Frega…
translation: MIRIAM: 弗雷加家族一直与她相熟。

original: She appears to be more receptive to Celeste.
translation: 她好像更接纳塞莱斯特。

original: It might be better to let her take the lead on the questioning.
translation: 让塞莱斯特来问会比较好。

original: CSteel: We heard that you saw her on the day of the murder.
translation: CSteel: 听说你在谋杀发生当天见过她？

original: CSteel: Could you tell us more about what happened?
translation: CSteel: 能多说说发生了些什么吗？

original: MIRIAM: Oh, you heard about that from your relative, did you?
translation: MIRIAM: 哦，你从你家亲戚那里听说的，是吗？

original: MIRIAM: If you don’t mind me asking,[p/] why are you so interested? [mind="She’s not like Aria, is she…?"/]
translation: MIRIAM: 你不介意的话，[p/]我能问问你为什么感兴趣吗？[mind="她跟阿莉亚不一样，是吗……？"/]

original: CSteel: O-[p/]Oh,[p/] you know.[p/] I’m just curious is all.
translation: CSteel: 哦、[p/]哦，[p/]这个嘛。[p/]我就是好奇。

original: CSteel: You know how uneventful life can be sometimes…
translation: CSteel: 你懂的吧，生活有时候真的很单调……

original: CSteel: …being a noble and all.
translation: CSteel: ……毕竟是贵族嘛。

original: Alright…[p/] tone it down.
translation: 行了……[p/]收敛一点。

original: MIRIAM: Oh,[p/] is that all?
translation: MIRIAM: 哦，[p/]就这么回事？

original: MIRIAM: I was worried you were going down the same path as that poor,[p/] confused Aria.
translation: MIRIAM: 我还担心你步上了那个又贫穷、[p/]又迷茫的阿莉亚的后尘。

original: …What does she mean by that?
translation: ……她这话说的是什么意思？

original: MIRIAM: But I’m in the middle of a study break anyways.
translation: MIRIAM: 不过，反正我也在学习的间隙。

original: MIRIAM: I suppose I have some time to sate your curiosity.
translation: MIRIAM: 想来我也算有空稍微满足一下你的好奇心。

original: MIRIAM: Construct, please prepare us some tea.[p/] Use that lotus tea we imported from the Eastern Kingdoms. [mind="She could be useful if I can win her favor."/]
translation: MIRIAM: 奥术构造体，请为我们奉茶。[p/]用东方古国进口的莲茶。[mind="如果能赢得她的好感，她或许能为我所用。"/]

original: Arcane: ACKNOWLEDGED.
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>遵命</size>。

original: CSteel: “Lotus tea”…?
translation: CSteel: “莲茶”……？

original: CSteel: You…[p/][s/] have Lotus Juice?!
translation: CSteel: 你……[p/][s/]有莲之水？！

original: …You feel like you’re slowly losing control of this situation.
translation: ……你感到局面逐渐失控。

original: CSteel: I heard that you saw the professor on the day of the murder.
translation: CSteel: 我听说谋杀当天你见过教授？

original: CSteel: Where did this happen?
translation: CSteel: 是在哪儿见到的？

original: MIRIAM: I was in the hallways when I saw her coming out of the headmaster’s office.
translation: MIRIAM: 我在走廊里，看到她从校长室出来。

original: MIRIAM: She was heading towards the library.
translation: MIRIAM: 她正往图书馆的方向走。

original: CSteel: Do you remember what time this happened?
translation: CSteel: 你还记得这一切发生在什么时候吗？

original: MIRIAM: Ah…[p/] I’m not really sure, honestly.
translation: MIRIAM: 啊……[p/]讲实话，我不太确定。

original: MIRIAM: It’s a little embarrassing…[p/] But I have a bad habit of getting too absorbed in my work.
translation: MIRIAM: 说来有点尴尬……[p/]但我有个坏习惯，容易沉浸在学习中。

original: MIRIAM: Sometimes I’ll let entire [i]hours[/i] pass by without noticing.
translation: MIRIAM: 有时候，<u>好几个小时</u>过去了我都注意不到。

original: TYRION: Do…[p/] you have a rough idea at least?
translation: TYRION: 你……[p/]大致上有个数吗？

original: MIRIAM: I…[p/] think it was in the morning.
translation: MIRIAM: 我觉得……[p/]大概是在上午。

original: She "[i]thinks[/i]" it was in the morning?
translation: “<u>她觉得</u>”是在上午？

original: CSteel: But anyways…[p/] did anything seem…[p/] off about her?
translation: CSteel: 那总之……[p/]她有什么……[p/]不对劲的吗？

original: MIRIAM: ...No.[p/] It was a short encounter.
translation: MIRIAM: ……没有。[p/]我们就简单寒暄了一下。

original: MIRIAM: I-[p/]I merely greeted her,[p/] and she responded in kind. [mind="Or at least… that’s what [i]should[/i] have happened…"/]
translation: MIRIAM: 我、[p]我就是向她问了好，[p/]然后她和蔼地回应了。[mind="至少……<u>本该</u>是这样……"/]

original: That thought just now…[p/] What does it mean?
translation: 她的心理活动……[p/]是什么意思？

original: You slowly glance at Celeste and catch her attention.
translation: 你缓缓扫了一眼塞莱斯特，引起了她的注意。

original: In small motions,[p/] you shake your head to indicate that Miriam is holding something back.
translation: 你微微摇了摇头，[p/]示意米莉亚姆在隐藏着什么东西。

original: CSTeel: Were you and the professor [i]really[/i] on good terms?
translation: CSTeel: 您和教授之间<u>真的</u>相处融洽吗？

original: CSTeel: I heard she was pretty mean towards the other students.
translation: CSTeel: 我听说她对其他学生挺凶的。

original: MIRIAM: Towards the riff-raff, maybe.[p/] But not to students like us.
translation: MIRIAM: 对那些乌合之众来说，或许是吧。[p/]不过，对我这样的学生可不一样。

original: MIRIAM: She was a great ally to House Frega. [mind="Or at least… she used to be."/]
translation: MIRIAM: 她是弗雷加家族的重要盟友。[mind="至少……她曾经是。"/]

original: MIRIAM: That’s why we were planning on appointing her as the new headmaster.
translation: MIRIAM: 这就是为什么我们打算任命她为新一任校长。

original: CSteel: Wait…[p/][s/] What did you just say?!
translation: CSteel: 等等……[p/][s/]你刚说什么？！

original: CSteel: Did you just say that your family was going to appoint [i]Bellwether[/i] as the new headmaster?!
translation: CSteel: 你说你们家族打算任用<u>贝尔维瑟</u>做新校长？

original: MIRIAM: Oh, I’m surprised you didn’t know.
translation: MIRIAM: 哦，你不知道这件事才让我惊讶呢。

original: MIRIAM: House Frega holds several seats on the academy’s board.
translation: MIRIAM: 弗雷加家族在校董事会有几个席位。

original: MIRIAM: We were making plans to have her replace that lout:[p/] Redmond.
translation: MIRIAM: 我们正打算让她代替那个废物雷德蒙呢。

original: They were going to sack the headmaster?!
translation: 他们要开除校长？

original: CSteel: …Did Headmaster Redmond know about this?
translation: CSteel: ……雷德蒙校长知道这事吗？

original: MIRIAM: Oh, of course not.[p/] This was part of a large-scale plan.
translation: MIRIAM: 哦，当然不了。[p/]这只是一个更大的计划的一部分。

original: MIRIAM: Along with Redmond,[p/] we were also going to replace all of the staff members with Arcane Constructs.
translation: MIRIAM: 连同雷德蒙在内，我们要用奥术构造体换掉全部的教职工。

original: MIRIAM: We had to keep everything under wraps,[p/] or else the help would have left prematurely.
translation: MIRIAM: 一切都得严格保密，[p/]不然帮工们就要在时机成熟前逃跑了。

original: Miriam: And where would [i]that[/i] leave us?
translation: Miriam: <u>这样的话</u>，我们该如何自处？

original: But Jan supposedly overheard Bellwether talking about the Constructs.
translation: 但是简在不经意间听到了贝尔维瑟提起那些奥术构造体。

original: Did Bellwether prematurely reveal the plan…?[p/] Or was Jan lying about how he found out?
translation: 贝尔维瑟提前暴露了计划吗……？[p/]还是简在他怎么发现这件事上说谎了？

original: MIRIAM: …But alas.[p/] With Bellwether gone,[p/] we’ll have to delay our plans.
translation: MIRIAM: ……随便吧。[p/]贝尔维瑟死后，我们只能推迟计划了。

original: CSteel: So…[p/] We heard that Aria took your rapier as evidence for the case.
translation: CSteel: 是这样的……[p/]我们听说阿莉亚把你的刺剑当作本案的证据拿走了。

original: MIRIAM: Can you believe her?![p/][s/] She [i]still[/i] won’t give it back to me!
translation: MIRIAM: 你敢信她吗？[p/][s/]她<u>还是</u>不把它还给我！

original: MIRIAM: My father will have my head if I can’t get it back soon!
translation: MIRIAM: 如果我不能马上拿回剑，父亲会要了我的命！

original: CSteel: How did it even become a part of the investigation anyways?
translation: CSteel: 它到底怎么和调查扯上关系的？

original: MIRIAM: I don’t know![p/][s/] Aria won’t tell me anything!
translation: MIRIAM: 我不知道！[p/][s/]阿莉亚什么都不告诉我！

original: MIRIAM: I swear...[p/] if that [i]necromancer[/i] was the one who stole it,[p/] I’ll execute him myself.
translation: MIRIAM: 我发誓……[p/]如果是被那个<u>死灵法师</u>偷走的，[p/]我会亲手处决他。

original: CSteel: ...So someone [i]did[/i] steal it from you?
translation: CSteel: ……所以某人<u>确实</u>从你那里把它偷走了？

original: MIRIAM: Yes…[p/] From right out of my room…
translation: MIRIAM: 是的……[p/]就从我的房间里……

original: CSteel: When did this happen?
translation: CSteel: 这是什么时候的事？

original: MIRIAM: About a few weeks ago.
translation: MIRIAM: 大概几周前吧。

original: MIRIAM: I noticed when I came back from one of my classes.
translation: MIRIAM: 我有一次下课回来，发现了这事。

original: MIRIAM: Someone removed the rapier from its display case in my room.
translation: MIRIAM: 有人从我房间里的展示柜里把刺剑拿走了。

original: TYRION: ...How did they get into your room in the first place?
translation: TYRION: ……他们一开始是怎么进入你的房间的？

original: CSteel: Do you think someone used magic to teleport past the door?
translation: CSteel: 你觉得是有人用魔法传送进来的吗？

original: MIRIAM: Please.[p/] I’m a master of [b]conjuration[/b] magic.
translation: MIRIAM: 得了吧。[p/]我是[b]召唤术[/b]魔法的大师。

original: MIRIAM: If someone attempted that,[p/] my enchantments would have shunted them out.
translation: MIRIAM: 如果有人尝试这么做，[p/]只会因我的法术吃闭门羹。

original: TYRION: This means the thief came through one of the doors or windows.
translation: TYRION: 这意味着，行窃者是从其中一扇门或者窗进来的。

original: MIRIAM: I bet it was that necromancer.
translation: MIRIAM: 我敢打赌是那个<u>死灵法师</u>干的。

original: Miriam: I’m sure a street child like him just [i]knows[/i] how to pick a lock.
translation: Miriam: 我确信，像他那样的街头混子恰好<u>知道</u>怎么撬锁。

original: CSteel: …
translation: CSteel: ……

original: CSteel: I’ve heard that you’re one of the academy’s top students.
translation: CSteel: 听说你是学院的顶尖学生之一。

original: CSteel: ...Your grades must be amazing!
translation: CSteel: ……你的成绩一定很好吧！

original: MIRIAM: Of course![p/] As an inheritor of House Frega,[p/] my grades are impeccable! [mind="It feels good to have my greatness recognized."/]
translation: MIRIAM: 这是自然！[p/]作为弗雷加家族的继承人之一，[p/]我的成绩无可挑剔！[mind="我的卓越为人所识，这感觉真是太好了。"/]

original: That’s strange…[p/] You don’t see anything contradictory through the Eye this time.
translation: 奇了怪了……[p/]这次，你没通过荷鲁斯之眼看出什么矛盾。

original: You make a gesture towards Celeste to continue pressing her.
translation: 你向塞莱斯特示意，让她继续施压。

original: CSteel: O-[p/]Oh…[p/] Um…
translation: CSteel: 哦、[p/]哦……[p/]呃……

original: CSteel: What kind of magic do you study here?
translation: CSteel: 你在这里学习什么魔法？

original: MIRIAM: You must be joking.[p/] I study magic from the school of [b]conjuration[/b].
translation: MIRIAM: 你在开玩笑吧。[p/]我学习[b]召唤术[/b]学派的魔法。

original: MIRIAM: Just like…[p/] most members of my house.
translation: MIRIAM: 就像……[p/]我家族的大多数人一样。

original: CSteel: The school of [b]conjuration[/b]…
translation: CSteel: [b]召唤术[/b]学派……

original: CSteel: That’s the type of magic that specializes in spatial manipulation and teleportation, right?
translation: CSteel: 那是专精操纵空间和传送的魔法，对吧？

original: MIRIAM: Yes.[p/] I consider myself quite the expert in that field.
translation: MIRIAM: 是的。[p/]我认为自己在那个领域算是颇有学识。

original: MIRIAM: Why,[p/] the crown prince himself has asked for my assistance in a research study. [mind="It's nice to work with someone of my caliber."/]
translation: MIRIAM: 王储殿下甚至亲自请求我协助一个研究项目。[mind="能和我这样水平的人一起工作真是不错。"/]

original: Again,[p/] you don’t see any thoughts that contradict what she’s saying.
translation: 这次她的想法和发言之间也没有矛盾。

original: Does that mean she’s not lying…?
translation: 这意味着她没有在说谎吗……？

original: If she’s smart enough to get the crown prince’s attention,[p/] why would she be cheating?
translation: 如果她聪明到能被王储殿下注意，[p/]她为什么要作弊？

original: CSteel: You said something about “my wayward relative” before.
translation: CSteel: 你之前提到了“叛逆的亲戚”。

original: CSteel: Were you talking about Aria?
translation: CSteel: 你是说阿莉亚吗？

original: MIRIAM: O-[p/][s/]Oh…[p/] I’m terribly sorry if I offended you.
translation: MIRIAM: 哦、[p/][s/]哦……[p/]如果我冒犯了你，我感到万分抱歉。

original: MIRIAM: But I’m sure it must pain you to see the way that she’s been acting lately.
translation: MIRIAM: 但我相信，她最近的行事风格一定让你颇感心痛。

original: CSteel: Y-[p/]Yes…[p/] It’s…[p/] been [i]extremely[/i] hard.
translation: CSteel: 是、[p/]是的……[p/]这……[p/]确实<u>极其</u>艰难。

original: Hang in there, Celeste.
translation: 坚持住，塞莱斯特。

original: MIRIAM: Did you know that she even interrogated [p/][i]me[/i] about the murder yesterday?
translation: MIRIAM: 你知道她昨天就谋杀案一事审问了[p/]<u>我</u>吗？

original: MIRIAM: Can you believe it?[p/] A [i]Steelwind[/i] running around a crime scene like a common knight.
translation: MIRIAM: 你敢信吗？[p/]<u>斯蒂尔文德家的人</u>像个普通骑士一样在犯罪现场忙活。

original: MIRIAM: Why if I tried something like that,[p/] my father would disown me.
translation: MIRIAM: 我要是这么干，[p/]我父亲会和我断绝关系。

original: Does the nobility not approve of Steelwind becoming a prosecutor?
translation: 贵族们是不是不赞成斯蒂尔文德成为检察官？

original: You always thought that it is strange…[p/] What is motivating her to do this?
translation: 你一直觉得这很奇怪……[p/]是什么促使她这样做？

original: MIRIAM: Honestly,[p/] she probably thinks she can do anything just because of her betrothed. [mind="Aster deserves better."/]
translation: MIRIAM: 说真的，[p/]因为她未婚夫在，她大概觉得自己能为所欲为。[mind="阿斯特值得更好的。"/]

original: CSteel: …!
translation: CSteel: ……！

original: Celeste's eyes perk up upon hearing this.
translation: 塞莱斯特听到这话，眼睛一下子亮了起来。

original: …You’d be lying if you weren’t [i]also[/i] curious about who this “Aster” is.
translation: ……你承认自己<u>也</u>对这个“阿斯特”的身份感到好奇。

original: But you shoot her a stern look that tells her to stay focused.
translation: 但是你投去一个严厉的眼神，告诉她保持专注。

original: You can’t risk blowing your cover for some gossip.
translation: 你不能因为一些绯闻而暴露伪装。

original: CSteel: You have an Arcane Construct in your room.
translation: CSteel: 你屋子里有一个奥术构造体。

original: CSteel: I thought they only had them in the library and the locker room.
translation: CSteel: 我以为他们只放在图书馆和储物室里。

original: MIRIAM: [i]This[/i] Construct was a gift from House von Sanctus.
translation: MIRIAM: <u>这个</u>奥术构造体是来自冯·桑克图斯家族的礼物。

original: MIRIAM: I have to say,[p/] they’re quite convenient to have around.
translation: MIRIAM: 不得不说，[p/]有他们在手边真是太方便了。

original: CSteel: They look really cool.[p/] Maybe I should get one.
translation: CSteel: 他们看起来真的很酷。[p/]也许我也该弄一个。

original: MIRIAM: You should.
translation: MIRIAM: 你是应该这么做。

original: Miriam: A Construct would be far more useful than this attendant of yours.
translation: Miriam: 奥术构造体会比你现在这个随侍更有用。

original: CSteel: ...
translation: CSteel: ……

original: MIRIAM: Unfortunately,[p/] there are still some issues with their intelligence.
translation: MIRIAM: 只是可惜，[p/]他们的智能还有些问题。

original: CSteel: Their “intelligence”?
translation: CSteel: 他们的“智能”？

original: MIRIAM: There are issues when you give them complex commands.
translation: MIRIAM: 给他们下达复杂命令时，会有些问题。

original: MIRIAM: Hm…[p/] It might be easier to show you.
translation: MIRIAM: 嗯……[p/]向你展示一下可能更直观些。

original: Miriam turns to the Construct and begins gesturing towards it.
translation: 米莉亚姆转向奥术构造体，对它做出指示。

original: MIRIAM: Construct.[p/] Please retrieve my textbooks and bring them here.
translation: MIRIAM: 奥术构造体。[p/]请取来我的课本。

original: MIRIAM: Then,[p/] cast [b]Steelwind Strike[/b] at this location.
translation: MIRIAM: 然后，[p/]在此处吟唱[b]斯蒂尔文德剑刃风暴[/b]。

original: MIRIAM: After that,[p/] retrieve some plates and set them out at this table.
translation: MIRIAM: 这之后，[p/]取来一些盘子，然后把它们摆到这张桌子上。

original: Arcane: ACKNOWLEDGED.
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>遵命</size>。

original: CSteel: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: CSteel: 啥、[p/][s/]啥？！

original: The Construct stands up and retrieves Miriam’s textbooks from one of the shelves in the room.
translation: 奥术构造体起身，从房间内的一个书架上取来了米莉亚姆的课本。

original: It brings them to the table you’re sitting at,[p/] just like she ordered.
translation: 它将课本放在你旁边的桌子上，[p/]就像她要求的一样。

original: But then…[p/] it suddenly stops moving.
translation: 但这之后……[p/]它忽然停下了。

original: CSteel: Wait…[p/] What happened?
translation: CSteel: 等等……[p/]发生了什么？

original: MIRIAM: The Construct obviously can’t cast [b]Steelwind Strike[/b].[p/] So my second command was impossible to carry out.
translation: MIRIAM: 奥术构造体当然不能吟唱[b]斯蒂尔文德剑刃风暴[/b]。[p/]所以我的第二个指令是不可能完成的。

original: MIRIAM: But did you notice something else?
translation: MIRIAM: 但是你注意到别的什么的了吗？

original: CSteel: …It ignored your third command too.
translation: CSteel: ……它也无视了你的第三个指令。

original: MIRIAM: Correct.[p/] My third command [i]was[/i] possible to carry out.
translation: MIRIAM: 没错。[p/]我的第三个指令<u>应当</u>是能完成的。

original: CSteel: So why did it ignore [i]that[/i] command?
translation: CSteel: 那它为什么无视了<u>那个</u>指令？

original: MIRIAM: Constructs execute a series of commands in the order that they are given.
translation: MIRIAM: 奥术构造体会按照顺序，执行收到的一系列指令。

original: MIRIAM: But let’s say one of those tasks is impossible to complete.
translation: MIRIAM: 但我们假设其中有些任务是无法完成的。

original: MIRIAM: When the Construct gets to that task,[p/] it will deem the [i]entire[/i] series impossible to complete.
translation: MIRIAM: 当奥术构造体开始执行无法完成的任务时，[p/]它会认定<u>整套</u>命令都无法执行。

original: MIRIAM: As a result,[p/] it will stop executing the series altogether.
translation: MIRIAM: 结果就是，[p/]它会停止执行全部任务。

original: CSteel: So if a task in a series of commands is impossible,[p/] then that command will interrupt the sequence of commands.
translation: CSteel: 也就是说如果一系列任务中之一无法完成，[p/]那么这个任务会中断后续任务的进行。

original: MIRIAM: Exactly.
translation: MIRIAM: 正是如此。

original: Miriam: Your attendant doesn't appear to actually do much.
translation: Miriam: 你的随侍看起来并没有干什么活。

original: Miriam: How [i]do[/i] you put up with him?
translation: Miriam: 你<u>到底</u>是怎么忍受他的？

original: CSteel: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] You know how it is...
translation: CSteel: 哦、[p/]哦……[p/]你也知道这是怎么回事……

original: You're a little touched about how angry she's getting on your behalf.
translation: 你对她为你生气的样子感到一丝感动。

original: Miriam: I wasn't aware another Steelwind had enrolled at the academy.
translation: Miriam: 我并不知道另一个斯蒂尔文德家的人也在学院就读。

original: Miriam: Which branch family were you from again?
translation: Miriam: 你是哪个分家出身的来着？

original: CSteel: I-[p/][s/]It's one of the far-off branches.
translation: CSteel: 是、[p/][s/]是个很旁支的家族。

original: CSteel: We're not that well-known.
translation: CSteel: 我们没那么出名。

original: Miriam: I…[p/] see.
translation: Miriam: 我……[p/]我明白了。

original: Miriam: Honestly,[p/] I don't know what Aria is thinking...
translation: Miriam: 老实说，[p/]我不知道阿莉亚在想什么……

original: Miriam: At this rate,[p/] it won't matter [i]which[/i] House she belongs to.
translation: Miriam: 照这样下去，[p/]不管她出身<u>什么</u>家族都没用。

original: Miriam: She'll be ruined...
translation: Miriam: 她会完蛋的……

original: CSteel: Are you...[p/] actually concerned about her?
translation: CSteel: 你真的……这么在乎她吗？

original: Miriam: W-[p/][s/]What?![p/][s/] Of course, not!
translation: Miriam: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！[p/][s/]我才不在乎她！

original: CSteel: By the way,[p/] do you happen to know Eris Illmater?
translation: CSteel: 顺带一提，[p/]你知道厄莉斯·伊尔马特这个人吗？

original: Miriam: O-[p/]Oh...
translation: Miriam: 啊、[p/]哦……

original: Miriam: I would stay away from her if I were you.
translation: Miriam: 如果我是你的话，我会离她远远的。

original: Miriam: I've heard some...[p/] unsavory things have happened to people that cross her.
translation: Miriam: 我听说……[p/]和她扯上关系的人都出了些难以启齿的事。

original: Miriam: It's no wonder that she joined forces with that necromancer...
translation: Miriam: 也难怪她和那个死灵法师走的那么近……

original: Miriam: It's such a shame what happened to the professor...
translation: Miriam: 教授的事真是太遗憾了……

original: Miriam: She truly was the best and brightest among the faculty.
translation: Miriam: 她真的是教职员工里最开朗最有实力的教授。

original: Well…[p/] She was certainly [i]something[/i]...
translation: 嗯……[p/]她确实有<u>实力</u>……

original: Miriam: I can't believe it took so long for that necromancer to be detained!
translation: Miriam: 真不敢相信拘留那个死灵法师要用这么久！

original: Miriam: All it took was a [i]literal[/i] murder!
translation: Miriam: 竟然要等到<u>真的</u>杀了人才把他捉拿归案！

original: Tyrion: ...The trial isn't over yet.[p/] He's innocent until proven guilty.
translation: Tyrion: ……审判还未结束。[p/]他在被证明有罪之前都是无辜的。

original: Miriam: Oh,[p/] of course,[p/] [i]you[/i] would say that.
translation: Miriam: 哦，[p/]<u>你</u>自然会这么想。

original: Miriam: You commoners can't [i]help[/i] but sympathize with each other.
translation: Miriam: 你们这些平民只会<u>忍不住</u>同情彼此。

original: CSteel: Do [i]not[/i] talk to him like that.
translation: CSteel: <u>不许</u>这样跟他说话。

original: Miriam: W-[p/][s/]Wha-?!
translation: Miriam: 啊、[p/][s/]啊——？！

original: CSteel: S-[p/]Sorry...[p/] Just tone it down,[p/] okay?
translation: CSteel: 抱、[p/]抱歉……[p/]总之我们心平气和地聊天，[p/]好吗？

original: Miriam: O-[p/]Of course...
translation: Miriam: 当、[p/]当然可以……

original: Miriam: Ugh...[p/] With the professor gone,[p/] the headmaster is just going to bring more of those street urchins into the academy.
translation: Miriam: 唔呃……[p/]教授不在了的话，[p/]校长又要让那些流浪儿童入学了。

original: CSteel: ...Is that really so bad, though?
translation: CSteel: ……倒也没那么坏吧？

original: CSteel: Every mage should have the right to develop their powers.
translation: CSteel: 每个法师都有挖掘自己潜力的权利。

original: Miriam: ...Don't tell me that Aria got to you.
translation: Miriam: ……别跟我说是阿莉亚教你这一套的。

original: Miriam: Mages were chosen by the Scaled Lord through divine right.
translation: Miriam: 法师是由鳞甲领主拉萨利昂通过圣权选出来的。

original: Miriam: Magic is something that should [i]only[/i] be held by the nobility.
translation: Miriam: 魔法这种东西就<u>只</u>应该被贵族所拥有。

original: Miriam: Those [i]bastard[/i] children have no right to call themselves mages!
translation: Miriam: 那些<u>野种</u>们没权自称法师！

original: CSteel: R-[p/]Right...
translation: CSteel: 没、[p/]没错……

original: …You feel a twinge of regret for putting Celeste in this situation.
translation: ……你为把塞莱斯特置于这种境地而感到有些后悔。

original: CSteel: The Fregas primarily control Wyverngarde's finances, right?
translation: CSteel: 弗雷加家主要掌控维文加德的经济对吗？

original: Miriam: But of course!
translation: Miriam: 那是当然！

original: Miriam: The Fregas own nearly every banking house in the kingdom.
translation: Miriam: 弗雷加家掌控着几乎国家里的每一家银行。

original: Miriam: One could even say that we alone are responsible for Wyverngarde's prosperity.
translation: Miriam: 甚至可以说维文加德能经济繁荣，都是我们一家的功劳。

original: ...How about sharing that "prosperity" with the commonfolk?
translation: ……那为什么不与平民分享那份“繁荣”呢？

original: Miriam: Ugh...[p/] I really hope Aria returns my rapier soon.
translation: Miriam: 呃啊……[p/]真希望阿莉亚能早点把我的剑还给我。

original: CSteel: It must be pretty important to you.
translation: CSteel: 那把剑对你来说一定很重要。

original: Miriam: It is an ancient family heirloom,[p/] owned by one of the first heroes of Wyverngarde.
translation: Miriam: 那是我家从上古时期代代相传的传家宝，[p/]曾是维文加德最初几位英雄之一的佩剑。

original: Miriam: My father will throw a fit if he finds out that it was stolen.
translation: Miriam: 我父亲要是知道那把剑被偷走了，肯定会大发雷霆。

original: CSteel: You have an Arcane Construct in your room.
translation: CSteel: 你房间里有个奥术构造体。

original: CSteel: I thought they only had them in the Library and Locker Room.
translation: CSteel: 我以为他们只放在图书馆和储物室里。

original: MIRIAM: [i]This[/i] Construct was a gift from House von Sanctus.
translation: MIRIAM: <u>这个</u>奥术构造体是来自冯·桑克图斯家族的礼物。

original: MIRIAM: I have to say,[p/] they’re quite convenient to have around.
translation: MIRIAM: 不得不说，[p/]有他们在手边真是太方便了。

original: CSteel: They look really cool.[p/] Maybe I should get one.
translation: CSteel: 他们看起来真的很酷。[p/]也许我也该弄一个。

original: MIRIAM: You should.
translation: MIRIAM: 你是应该这么做。

original: Miriam: A Construct would be far more useful than this attendant of yours.
translation: Miriam: 奥术构造体会比你现在这个随侍更有用。

original: CSteel: ...
translation: CSteel: ……

original: CSteel: What do you think about this, Miriam?
translation: CSteel: 米莉亚姆，你对这个怎么看？

original: Miriam: O-[p/][s/]Oh…[p/] Um…
translation: Miriam: 啊、[p/][s/]哦……[p/]嗯……

original: Miriam: …I’m terribly sorry.
translation: Miriam: ……万分抱歉。

original: Miriam: But I don’t have much to say about that.
translation: Miriam: 但我对这个一无所知。

original: You follow Ms. Steelwind’s directions and find Miriam Frega’s dorm room.
translation: 你跟随斯蒂尔文德女士的指示，找到了米莉亚姆·弗雷加的宿舍。

original: The door leading inside seems a lot more ornately decorated than the other dorms.
translation: 房门对比起其他宿舍可谓是富丽堂皇。

original: You go to knock on the door,[p/] but you don’t realize that it’s only partially closed.
translation: 你上前敲了敲门，[p/]但没想到门只是半掩着。

original: As your fist comes into contact with the wood,[p/] you accidentally push the door wide open.
translation: 你拳头碰到门时，[p/]一不小心就把门推了个大开。

original: Miriam: …!
translation: Miriam: ……！

original: Miriam: Excuse me?![p/][s/] How [i]dare[/i] you barge into my room! [mind="These insects have no respect!"/]
translation: Miriam: 哈？！[p/][s/] 你竟然胆敢闯进我的房间！ [mind="这些虫子简直毫无礼貌！"/]

original: TYRION: S-[p/][s/]Sorry![p/] I meant to knock, but-
translation: TYRION: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉！[p/]我想敲门的，但是——

original: Miriam: Construct![p/][s/] Remove these hoodlums from my room!
translation: Miriam: 奥术构造体！[p/][s/]把这些流氓从我的房间里赶出去！

original: Arcane: ACKNOWLEDGED.
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>遵命</size>。

original: From the corner of the room,[p/] an Arcane Construct stands up and starts making its way toward you.
translation: 一个奥术构造体从房间角落朝你走了过来。

original: Before you can protest,[p/] it raises its fist to hit you.
translation: 还没等你解释，[p/]它就已经朝你举起了拳头。

original: CELESTE: …!
translation: CELESTE: ……！

original: You only have enough time to raise your arms and brace yourself for the impact.
translation: 时间只够你举起手臂，准备承受冲击。

original: You close your eyes and wait for the blow.
translation: 你闭上双眼等待这一击。

original: …But instead,[p/] you hear the clang of steel against steel.
translation: ……但你只听到了钢铁碰撞的铿锵声。

original: CELESTE: …
translation: CELESTE: ……

original: Confused,[p/] you open your eyes and see Celeste standing between you and the Construct.
translation: 疑惑地睁开双眼，[p/]你看到塞莱斯特站在你和奥术构造体之间。

original: Her sword is drawn and she’s using it to block the Construct’s fist.
translation: 她拔出剑，用剑抵住了奥术构造体的铁拳。

original: Miriam: …!
translation: Miriam: ……！

original: Upon taking a closer look at Celeste,[p/] the student stares curiously at her.
translation: 仔细打量了塞莱斯特之后，[p/]屋里的学生好奇地盯着她。

original: Miriam: …Construct.[p/] Stand down.
translation: Miriam: ……奥术构造体，[p/]退下。

original: Arcane: ACKNOWLEDGED.
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>遵命</size>。

original: Miriam: I’m…[p/] terribly sorry for that.[p/] I wasn’t aware that this was your servant.
translation: Miriam: 我……[p/]真是十分抱歉。[p/]我不知道他是你的随侍。

original: CELESTE: …
translation: CELESTE: ……

original: Celeste looks angry but puts away her sword without a word.
translation: 塞莱斯特看起来十分生气，但还是一言不发的收起了剑。

original: Miriam: I haven’t noticed you around campus.[p/] Are you a new student? [mind="If she has a personal attendant, she [i]must[/i] be important."/]
translation: Miriam: 我在学校还没见过你，[p/]你是新生吗？[mind="她既然有能私人随从，身世<u>必然</u>不简单。"/]

original: CELESTE: …What?
translation: CELESTE: ……什么？

original: You see an opportunity.
translation: 有机会。

original: TYRION: Y-[p/][s/]Yes.[p/] My…[p/] master just enrolled here recently.
translation: TYRION: 没、[p/][s/]没错，[p/]我的……[p/]主人刚入学没多久。

original: CELESTE: ...What?!
translation: CELESTE: ……哈？！

original: Celeste gives you a puzzled look.[p/] But you make a silent gesture back.
translation: 塞莱斯特投来不解的视线，[p/]但你给她比了个安静的手势。

original: After a moment,[p/] she seems to realize what you’re doing.
translation: 她愣了一瞬，[p/]貌似明白了你的意思。

original: CELESTE: Y-[p/][s/]Yes![p/] I just…[p/][s/] started here!
translation: CELESTE: 对、[p/][s/]没错！[p/]我……[p/][s/]刚入学！

original: CELESTE: I take it [i]you’re[/i] Miriam Frega?
translation: CELESTE: 我想<u>你就是</u>米莉亚姆·弗雷加了吧？

original: MIRIAM: Yes.[p/] I’m honored that you recognize me.
translation: MIRIAM: 正是。[p/]很荣幸你认得我。

original: MIRIAM: It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Ms.…
translation: MIRIAM: 很高兴能认识你，贵姓……

original: CELESTE: I’m Celeste.[p/] Celeste Mc-
translation: CELESTE: 叫我塞莱斯特，[p/]塞莱斯特·麦考——

original: She catches herself.[p/] And pauses for an awkward moment.
translation: 她把嘴边的姓吞了回去，[p/]尴尬地顿了一下。

original: CELESTE: SSsssteel…[p/][s/]wind![p/][s/] I’m Celeste Steelwind!
translation: CELESTE: 斯斯斯斯蒂尔……[p/][s/]文德！[p/][s/]我叫塞莱斯特·斯蒂尔文德！

original: TYRION: …
translation: TYRION: ……

original: You can't believe her...[p/] There’s no way she's going to believe-
translation: 真服了她了……[p/]这种谎对方怎么可能会信——

original: MIRIAM: S-[p/][s/]Steelwind?!
translation: MIRIAM: 斯、[p/][s/]斯蒂尔文德？！

original: MIRIAM: Um…[p/][s/] It’s a pleasure to meet another member of such an esteemed house! [mind="She must be from a branch family… Maybe I can use her…"/]
translation: MIRIAM: 唔姆……[p/][s/]很荣幸能认识另一位来自崇高家族的成员！[mind="她一定来自分家……或许我能利用她……"/]

original: Wait…[p/][s/] She’s actually buying this?!
translation: 等下……[p/][s/]她还真吃这一套？！

original: CSteel: I…[p/] just moved in.[p/] And…[p/] I thought that I should introduce myself.
translation: CSteel: 我……[p/]刚刚入学。[p/]所以……[p/]我想着应该自我介绍一下。

original: CSteel: Seeing as you’re a top student in the field of conjugation.
translation: CSteel: 知晓你是召唤术领域的顶尖学生之后。

original: TYRION: [b]Conjuration[/b].
translation: TYRION: [b]召唤术[/b]。

original: CSteel: Yes.
translation: CSteel: 对，召唤术。

original: …Well.[p/] There’s no backing out now.
translation: ……现在已经没有回头路了。

original: TYRION: Lady…[p/] Steelwind.[p/] I’m afraid we must leave now if we want to make our next engagement.
translation: TYRION: 斯蒂尔文德……[p/]小姐。[p/]下一场会面的时间快到了，我们恐怕该走了。

original: CSteel: O-[p/]Oh,[p/][s/] right!
translation: CSteel: 啊、[p/]哦，[p/][s/]哦对！

original: CSteel: Let’s go…[p/] servant.
translation: CSteel: 我们走吧……[p/]随从。

original: MIRIAM: Oh?[p/] Leaving already?
translation: MIRIAM: 哦？[p/]这么快就要走了吗？

original: MIRIAM: It was a pleasure talking to you.
translation: MIRIAM: 我们的对话真的沁人心脾，十分愉悦。

original: CSteel: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah![p/][s/] Sure!
translation: CSteel: 嗯、[p/][s/]对！[p/][s/]当然！

original: CSteel: I hope to see you around.
translation: CSteel: 希望能再见到你。

original: You make your way back to the foyer with Celeste.
translation: 你与塞莱斯特回到了前厅。

original: With all the time you’ve spent,[p/] you only have a brief amount of time before night falls.
translation: 花了这么多时间，[p/]距夜幕降临已经只剩下一点点时间了。

original: CELESTE: Are you sure you didn’t want to talk to her more?
translation: CELESTE: 你确定不需要再和她多聊聊了吗？

original: CELESTE: We were getting a lot out of her.
translation: CELESTE: 我们从她身上得知了不少情报。

original: TYRION: We already got a lot of useful information out of her.
translation: TYRION: 我们已经从她身上知道不少有用的信息了。

original: TYRION: The more time we spend with her,[p/] the more likely she is to see through our ruse.
translation: TYRION: 呆得越久，[p/]她识破我们诡计的可能就越大。

original: CELESTE: R-[p/]Right…
translation: CELESTE: 这、[p/]这倒没错……

original: TYRION: So…[p/] Why “Steelwind”?
translation: TYRION: 所以说……[p/]为什么选“斯蒂尔文德”？

original: CELESTE: I don’t know![p/][s/] I panicked!
translation: CELESTE: 我也不知道！[p/][s/]我当时很慌！

original: CELESTE: Aria is like...[p/] the only noble I know.
translation: CELESTE: 阿莉亚就是……[p/]唯一一个我知道的贵族。

original: TYRION: What about Pierce?
translation: TYRION: 你不是还知道皮尔斯吗？

original: CELESTE: I’m not using that creep’s name!
translation: CELESTE: 我才不会用那个恶心的家伙的名字！

original: TYRION: Well...[p/] Hopefully Steelwind doesn’t mind us “borrowing” her name.
translation: TYRION: 好吧……希望斯蒂尔文德不会介意我们“借用”她的名号。

original: CELESTE: And we got her statement on what she saw that day.
translation: CELESTE: 总之我们拿到了她的目击证言。

original: TYRION: And there's also what she said about her rapier…
translation: TYRION: 而且也有关于她那把刺剑的情报……

original: CELESTE: I bet she was lying when she said it was stolen…
translation: CELESTE: 我赌她说剑被偷是在撒谎……

original: CELESTE: She was probably trying to establish an alibi.
translation: CELESTE: 她大概率是想给自己找个不在场证明。

original: TYRION: I’m…[p/] not so sure.
translation: TYRION: 我……[p/]不是很确定。

original: CELESTE: Why do you say that?
translation: CELESTE: 为什么？

original: TYRION: Doesn’t it feel…[p/] too obvious?
translation: TYRION: 你不觉得这有点……[p/]太刻意了吗？

original: TYRION: If she was lying about the rapier being stolen,[p/] that would imply that she planned all of this in advance.
translation: TYRION: 如果说她在剑被偷这件事上撒谎，[p/]也就意味着她提前准备了这一切。

original: TYRION: But if she had to choose a murder weapon,[p/] why would she choose something that [i]literally[/i] has her name on it?
translation: TYRION: 不过如果她必须选一个凶器，[p/]为什么要选一件出自弗雷加家的武器呢？

original: TYRION: I’d understand if the murder was a spur-of-the-moment decision.[p/] She might've just used something nearby in this case.
translation: TYRION: 如果说这场谋杀只是一时冲动所造成的，[/p]用手边的武器来作案倒还可以理解。

original: TYRION: But if this was a premeditated murder committed by Miriam,[p/] that rapier would be the [i]last[/i] weapon she would choose.
translation: TYRION: 但假设这是一场由米莉亚姆精心策划的谋杀，[p/]那刺剑会是她最不可能选的作案工具。

original: CELESTE: Right…[p/] I guess that makes sense.
translation: CELESTE: 对哦……[p/]确实有道理。

original: TYRION: There’s also the “evidence” of academic dishonesty.
translation: TYRION: 同时还有关于学术舞弊的“证据”。

original: TYRION: It doesn’t match up with what we heard from Miriam.
translation: TYRION: 与我们从米莉亚姆那得到的情报不符。

original: CELESTE: You mean all that stuff about working with the crowned prince?
translation: CELESTE: 你是说和王子合作的那个项目？

original: CELESTE: She was probably just making things up to look good in front of me.
translation: CELESTE: 她也可能只是为了装模作样编出来的。

original: TYRION: I have…[p/] an insight when it comes to things like this.
translation: TYRION: 我……[p/]在这方面有种独特的洞察力。

original: TYRION: Under normal circumstances,[p/] I can usually tell when someone is lying.
translation: TYRION: 通常来讲，[p/]我能分辨一个人是否在说谎。

original: TYRION: And a lie as grandiose as that would be something I would definitely see through.
translation: TYRION: 如果是那么不切实际的谎言，我是肯定能看穿的。

original: People can subconsciously shield themselves from the Eye of Horus,[p/] even if they don’t know about it.
translation: 就算不知道荷鲁斯之眼的存在，[p/]人们也能潜意识地保护自己。

original: But when they do that,[p/] you usually can’t see [i]any[/i] thoughts from them.
translation: 当这种情况发生时，[p/]你通常没办法读到他们的<u>任何</u>思绪。

original: You also saw that she was lying about her encounter with Bellwether.
translation: 你也看穿了她在与贝尔维瑟相遇时的事上撒了谎。

original: You would’ve seen dissonant thoughts if she was lying about her grades.
translation: 如果她在成绩上撒谎，你肯定也会看见不和谐的思绪。

original: CELESTE: Well, I guess I’ll trust your “insight”.
translation: CELESTE: 好吧，我相信你的“洞察力”。

original: CELESTE: But what does this mean?
translation: CELESTE: 但这意味着什么呢？

original: TYRION: I…[p/] don’t know.
translation: TYRION: 我……[p/]也不知道。

original: TYRION: Even with everything we’ve found,[p/] I’m still not sure who the real culprit is…
translation: TYRION: 尽管我们已经搜集了这么多信息，[p/]但我还是不确定真凶是谁……

original: TYRION: At the very least,[p/] I think we should still try to pull Miriam onto the stand.
translation: TYRION: 至少，[p/]我还是觉得应该试着让米莉亚姆出庭作证

original: TYRION: If she testifies in court,[p/] I might be able to find something I can use.
translation: TYRION: 要是她能在法庭上作证，[p/]我也许能找到一些蛛丝马迹。

original: But that’s a big “maybe”.
translation: 但这风险太大。

original: If you don’t play your cards right,[p/] you might spook the Fregas enough for them to pay off the judge.
translation: 如果这张牌打得不好，[p/]可能会打草惊蛇，反而让弗雷加家族直接贿赂法官。

original: CELESTE: Either way…[p/] It’s getting late.[p/] We’ll probably have to turn in soon.
translation: CELESTE: 无论如何……[p/]已经这么晚了。[p/]我们应该早点睡觉了。

original: TYRION: Yeah…
translation: TYRION: 是啊……

original: You just hope you did enough to acquit Wallace.
translation: 希望目前为止所做的一切足以为华莱士脱罪。

original: Tyrion: It's a statue...[p/] There's some writing on the platform it's on.
translation: Tyrion: 一座雕像……[p/]它的底座上写着几行字：

original: Tyrion: "Gillian Kemnitz:[p/] the inventor of early artificery."
translation: Tyrion: “Gillian Kemnitz，[p/]初期奥术能源的发明者。”

original: Celeste: Hm...[p/] So [i]this[/i] guy is the one who invented it.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]所以是<u>这个人</u>发明了它。

original: Celeste: Who'd have thought that we could use machines to harness magical energy?
translation: Celeste: 谁能想到机器也能利用魔法能量呢？

original: Tyrion: Artificery is truly a marvelous invention.
translation: Tyrion: 奥术能源确实是一项伟大的发明。

original: Tyrion: With it,[p/] anyone can utilize the convenience of magic [i]without[/i] having noble blood.
translation: Tyrion: 有了它，[p/]<u>即使没有</u>贵族血统，人们也能享受魔法带来的便利。

original: Although...[p/] The expenses of owning artificery present their own barrier...
translation: 虽然说……[p/]拥有奥术能源的花费本身就设置了门槛……

original: Celeste: But...[p/] that expression on his statue.
translation: Celeste: 不过……[p/]看他雕像上的那个表情。

original: Celeste: It kind of looks like he doesn't want to be here,[p/] even though his statue is [i]huge[/i].
translation: Celeste: 他本人好像并不想待在这里，[p/]虽说他的雕像真的很<u>巨大</u>。

original: He [i]does[/i] give off that attitude, doesn't he?
translation: 他<u>确实</u>表现出那种态度，不是吗？

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of a man with some sort of creature on his arm.
translation: Tyrion: 一幅描绘了手臂上附着某种生物的男士的画。

original: Tyrion: There's some text under it.
translation: Tyrion: 下面写着什么。

original: Tyrion: "Doctor Delbit Taphoros: a mage,[p/] historian,[p/] archeologist,[p/] anthropologist,[p/] and botanist."
translation: Tyrion: “Delbit Taphoros 博士：一位法师，[p/]历史学家，[p/]考古学家，[p/]人类学家，[p/]以及植物学家。”

original: Tyrion: "Best known for his work in studying the history of the ancient dragons."
translation: Tyrion: “因其关于古龙历史的研究工作而广为人知。”

original: Tyrion: "Through his work,[p/] great leaps were made in the study and development of the school of [b]evocation[/b]."
translation: Tyrion: “多亏他的努力，[p/]关于[b]塑能术[/b]的研究与发展得到巨大的飞跃。”

original: Tyrion: "On his arm is one of the last pseudodragons,[p/] which have now gone extinct."
translation: Tyrion: “他手臂上的是最后几只伪龙之一，[p/]现在这一物种已经灭绝。”

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of a professor with some kind of magical tool.
translation: Tyrion: 一幅描绘了教授与某种魔法工具的画。

original: Tyrion: There's some text under it.
translation: Tyrion: 下面写着什么。

original: Tyrion: "Doctor Paul Vuorela:[p/] also known as the Archeologist of the North"
translation: Tyrion: “Paul Vuorela 博士，[p/]别名北境考古学家。”

original: Tyrion: "He spent many years studying and exploring the mountainous regions of Shardalon."
translation: Tyrion: “多年来他专注于舍达隆山区的研究与探索工作。”

original: Tyrion: "And through his investigation,[p/] he came upon one of the many lairs of the Scaled Lord."
translation: Tyrion: “通过调查，[p/]他偶然发现了鳞甲领主的众多巢穴之一。”

original: Tyrion: "He was honored both by the Church [i]and[/i] the Wyverngarde Historical Society for this impressive discovery."
translation: Tyrion: “因这项令人赞叹的发现，他同时获得了大教堂<u>以及</u>王国历史学会的奖励。”

original: Celeste: I hope Wallace is okay...[p/] He looked really scared when Commander White arrested him.
translation: Celeste: 我希望华莱士还好……[p/]被怀特指挥官逮捕的时候，他看起来真的很害怕。

original: Tyrion: Don't worry.[p/] We'll find out what really happened.
translation: Tyrion: 别担心。[p/]我们会调查清楚到底发生了什么事情。

original: But first, you need to inspect the crime scene.
translation: 但首先，你需要调查犯罪现场。

original: Celeste: Do you think Steelwind was right?
translation: Celeste: 你认为斯蒂尔文德说得对吗？

original: Celeste: Is Wallace really a necromancer?
translation: Celeste: 华莱士真的是个死灵法师吗？

original: Tyrion: I'm sure he has his reasons...
translation: Tyrion: 他一定有自己的原因……

original: Tyrion: But more importantly,[p/] I can't help but feel like Steelwind is hiding something from us.
translation: Tyrion: 但更重要的是，[p/]我总觉得斯蒂尔文德向我们隐瞒了什么事情。

original: Celeste: Is that really so strange?
translation: Celeste: 真的有那么奇怪吗？

original: Celeste: We [i]did[/i] make a deal with her.[p/] But we're also facing her in the trial.
translation: Celeste: 我们<u>是</u>与她做了个交易，[p/]但我们还是要和她法庭相见。

original: Tyrion: I suppose you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 我想你说得对。

original: But you still wonder what she's hiding.
translation: 但你还是好奇她隐瞒了什么。

original: Celeste: I feel like the more we find out about Bellwether,[p/] the worse she looks.
translation: Celeste: 感觉我们对贝尔维瑟了解越多，[p/]她就显得越坏。

original: Celeste: It makes me wonder if her death was really such a bad thing.
translation: Celeste: 这都让我觉得她的死或许不是件坏事。

original: Tyrion: ...Regardless of the type of person she was,[p/] no one deserves to be murdered in cold blood.
translation: Tyrion: ……不管她到底是哪种人，[p/]没有人应该被这样残忍地杀害。

original: Tyrion: And now Wallace is being falsely charged for it...
translation: Tyrion: 何况现在华莱士被误指控为凶手……

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Celeste: 是啊……[p/]我想你是对的。

original: Celeste: I wonder if we'd find Valentina if we just kept snooping around the academy.
translation: Celeste: 我在想就这么继续在学院四处窥探的话，能不能找到瓦伦蒂娜。

original: Tyrion: It'd be best not to scare her more than we already have.
translation: Tyrion: 我们最好不要让她更害怕了。

original: Tyrion: For now,[p/] let's focus on the other leads we have.
translation: Tyrion: 现在，[p/]我们还是专注在其他线索上吧。

original: Celeste: Alright...
translation: Celeste: 好吧……

original: Celeste: I can't believe Bellwether was going to fire [i]everyone[/i].
translation: Celeste: 我不敢相信贝尔维瑟想要解雇<u>所有人</u>。

original: Celeste: Did she really hate the commonfolk [i]that[/i] much?
translation: Celeste: 她真的有<u>那么</u>仇视平民吗？

original: Tyrion: It's not always about hate.
translation: Tyrion: 这不总是因为单纯的厌恨。

original: Tyrion: Some people go mad with power the moment they get [i]any[/i] sort of authority over people.
translation: Tyrion: 有些人一旦获得<u>任何</u>凌驾于他人之上权力，就会因此发狂。

original: Tyrion: I imagine she wanted to fire the faculty members just to show them that she could.
translation: Tyrion: 我想她计划解雇整个教职工群体，也只是为了向他们炫耀自己有这么大的权力。

original: Celeste: She really [i]was[/i] a horrible person, wasn't she?
translation: Celeste: 她<u>真是</u>个糟糕的家伙，不是吗？

original: Celeste: I never knew that healing magic was considered [b]necromancy[/b].
translation: Celeste: 我从来都不知道治愈魔法也是一种[b]死灵术[/b]。

original: Tyrion: Those stories of madmen raising armies of the undead are pretty horrifying when you think about it.
translation: Tyrion: 想想那些疯子唤起僵尸大军的故事，还真的挺恐怖的。

original: Tyrion: That must have overshadowed everything else.
translation: Tyrion: 这也肯定影响了其他的法术。

original: Tyrion: ...I can't help but wonder, though.
translation: Tyrion: ……但我忍不住会想。

original: Tyrion: How many diseases could we have cured with [b]necromancy[/b] if the Crown didn’t control it?
translation: Tyrion: 如果王家不去控制它，多少疾病本来可能被[b]死灵术[/b]治愈呢？

original: Celeste: Where should we go next?
translation: Celeste: 我们接下来该去哪里？

original: Tyrion: The first thing we need to do is find out exactly what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 首先我们需要弄清楚到底发生了什么。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora said that the body was found in Lecture Hall 2-B.
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士说了，尸体是在 2-B 讲堂被找到的。

original: Tyrion: We should start our investigation there.
translation: Tyrion: 我们应该从那里开始调查。

original: Tyrion: The headmaster supposedly had a meeting with Bellwether this morning.
translation: Tyrion: 校长应该和贝尔维瑟约好在上午会面。

original: Tyrion: He might have been the last person to see her alive.
translation: Tyrion: 他可能是最后一个看到她还活着的人。

original: Tyrion: We should see if he noticed anything off about her before she left.
translation: Tyrion: 我们应该看看在她离开前，他是否有注意到什么不对劲的地方。

original: Tyrion: Two members of the kitchen staff discovered the body.[p/] So we should talk to them next.
translation: Tyrion: 两个厨房的工作人员发现了尸体。[p/]我们也应该和她们谈一谈。

original: Tyrion: They might have seen something that we didn't find at the crime scene.
translation: Tyrion: 她们或许看到了我们在犯罪现场没发现的细节。

original: Tyrion: The academy is probably closed for the investigation,[p/] but we might still be able to find them in the kitchen.
translation: Tyrion: 学院很可能因调查暂时关闭，[p/]但我们应该能在厨房找到她们。

original: Tyrion: I'm a little suspicious of Valentina.[p/] But I don't think chasing her will do us any favors.
translation: Tyrion: 我觉得瓦伦蒂娜有一点可疑。[p/]但我不觉得追查她能帮上我们什么忙。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] she mentioned something peculiar about Bellwether "firing everyone".
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]她提到过一个奇怪的说法，贝尔维瑟要“解雇所有人”。

original: Tyrion: And that rumor supposedly came from a custodian named "Jan Hughes".
translation: Tyrion: 而这个流言似乎来自一个叫“简·休斯”的管理人。

original: Tyrion: If we walk through the hallways,[p/] we might be able to find him and ask him ourselves.
translation: Tyrion: 如果我们在走廊里找找，[p/]也许就能碰见他，当面问一问这件事。

original: Tyrion: The Inquisition should be finished questioning Wallace by now.
translation: Tyrion: 裁判所现在应该结束了对华莱士的讯问。

original: Tyrion: If we MOVE to the Barracks,[p/] we might finally be able to speak with him.
translation: Tyrion: 如果我们向收容处<size=1.5em>移动</size>，[p/]应该就能和他交谈了。

original: Tyrion: Valentina has probably returned to the kitchen by now.
translation: Tyrion: 瓦伦蒂娜现在应该回到厨房了。

original: Tyrion: If we MOVE there,[p/] you should be able to scan her and see if she has any magical traces attached to her.
translation: Tyrion: 如果我们向那里<size=1.5em>移动</size>，[p/]你应该可以用[b]法术探测[/b]扫描她，看看她身上有没有什么魔法痕迹。

original: Tyrion: Now that I think about it,[p/] this is the first case we've worked together.
translation: Tyrion: 我现在才想到，[p/]这是我们合作处理的第一个案件。

original: Celeste: It's kind of fun seeing you work through everything.
translation: Celeste: 看你做这些事情还挺有趣的。

original: Celeste: And it's a lot calmer than working as a mercenary.
translation: Celeste: 而且这比当雇佣兵要祥和多了。

original: Tyrion: What did you do as a mercenary?
translation: Tyrion: 你当雇佣兵的时候都做什么？

original: Celeste: I mostly just fought things and collected bounties.
translation: Celeste: 基本上就是一直在战斗和捡战利品。

original: Celeste: Bandits,[p/] goblins,[p/] dinosaurs,[p/] you know how it is.
translation: Celeste: 强盗啊，[p/]地精啊，[p/]恐龙啊，[p/]你也知道就是这些东西。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You're not entirely sure if she was joking about the "dinosaurs".
translation: 你难以确定她说“恐龙”是不是在开玩笑。

original: Tyrion: Now that I think about it,[p/] this is the first case we've worked together.
translation: Tyrion: 我现在才想到，[p/]这是我们合作处理的第一个案件。

original: Celeste: It's kind of fun seeing you work through everything.
translation: Celeste: 看你做这些事情还挺有趣的。

original: Celeste: And it's a lot calmer than working as a mercenary.
translation: Celeste: 而且这比当雇佣兵要祥和多了。

original: Tyrion: What did you do as a mercenary?
translation: Tyrion: 你当雇佣兵的时候都做什么？

original: Celeste: I mostly just fought things and collected bounties.
translation: Celeste: 我基本上就是一直在战斗和捡战利品。

original: Celeste: Bandits,[p/] goblins,[p/] dinosaurs,[p/] you know how it is.
translation: Celeste: 强盗啊，[p/]地精啊，[p/]恐龙啊，[p/]你也知道就是这些东西。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You're not entirely sure if she was joking about the "dinosaurs".
translation: 你难以确定她说“恐龙”是不是在开玩笑。

original: Celeste: I didn't expect Steelwind to be working this case too.
translation: Celeste: 我没想到斯蒂尔文德也在处理这个案子。

original: Tyrion: She appears to be prosecuting the cases brought forth by the Inquisition.
translation: Tyrion: 她好像是负责起诉裁判所移交的案件。

original: Tyrion: We'll probably be seeing a lot more of her in the future.
translation: Tyrion: 我们将来可能还会多次见面。

original: Tyrion: Poor Eris...[p/] Her friend was falsely accused of murder and arrested.
translation: Tyrion: 可怜的厄莉斯……[p/]她的朋友被当作凶手逮捕了。

original: Tyrion: I hope she's doing okay.
translation: Tyrion: 我希望她还好。

original: Celeste: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...[p/] Me too.
translation: Celeste: 是、[p/][s/]是哦……[p/]我也是。

original: You're detecting fear from her again.
translation: 你又一次从她身上探测到恐惧的反应。

original: Celeste: I feel like the more we find out about Bellwether,[p/] the worse she looks.
translation: Celeste: 感觉我们对贝尔维瑟了解越多，[p/]她就显得越坏。

original: Celeste: It makes me wonder if her death was really such a bad thing.
translation: Celeste: 这都让我觉得她的死或许不是件坏事。

original: Tyrion: ...Regardless of the type of person she was,[p/] no one deserves to be murdered in cold blood.
translation: Tyrion: ……不管她到底是哪种人，[p/]没有人应该被这样残忍地杀害。

original: Tyrion: And now Wallace is being falsely charged for it...
translation: Tyrion: 何况现在华莱士被误指控为凶手……

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Celeste: 是啊……[p/]我想你是对的。

original: Celeste: Jan looks like he's in a constant state of being tired.[p/] I feel kind of bad for him.
translation: Celeste: 简这人看起来好像一直处于疲惫之中。[p/]我都有点替他难过。

original: Tyrion: Are you sure he's not just lazy?
translation: Tyrion: 你不觉得他只是懒吗？

original: Celeste: Hey![p/] If he wasn't competent,[p/] the headmaster wouldn't go to so much trouble to keep him employed here.
translation: Celeste: 喂！[p/]如果他没有能力的话，[p/]校长才不会一直雇他工作自找麻烦呀。

original: She…[p/] has a point there.[p/] Maybe he's more reliable than he appears to be.
translation: 她……[p/]说得有道理。[p/]可能他比外表看起来要更可靠。

original: Celeste: The more we talk to them,[p/] the more suspicious the Ianus sisters look.
translation: Celeste: 我们和伊努斯姐妹谈得越多，[p/]她们看起来就越发可疑。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] They're definitely hiding something.
translation: Tyrion: 是的……[p/]她们肯定在隐瞒什么。

original: But it doesn't matter.[p/] You'll pull the truth out of them,[p/] one way or another.
translation: 但这不重要。[p/]你无论如何都会从她们身上挖出真相。

original: Celeste: We really don't know that much about Wallace...
translation: Celeste: 我们其实并不怎么了解华莱士……

original: Tyrion: Regardless,[p/] we know that he has a solid alibi for the murder.
translation: Tyrion: 不论如何，[p/]我们很清楚他在谋杀发生时有充分的不在场证明。

original: Tyrion: There's no way that he killed Bellwether.
translation: Tyrion: 他没有办法杀死贝尔维瑟。

original: Celeste: You really believe in your clients, don't you?
translation: Celeste: 你真的很信任自己的委托人，不是吗？

original: Tyrion: Of course.[p/] I'll never stop fighting for what's right.
translation: Tyrion: 当然。[p/]我会一直为了正义战斗下去。

original: Celeste: But is that really...?
translation: Celeste: 但真的……？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么了？

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]Never mind...
translation: Celeste: 没、[p/][s/]没什么……

original: Tyrion: Okay...?
translation: Tyrion: 是吗……？

original: Tyrion: [b]Spell Compendiums[/b] are really useful.
translation: Tyrion: [b]法术汇编[/b]挺有用的。

original: Celeste: Yep![p/] They help us mages keep track of our spell formulas.
translation: Celeste: 是呀！[p/]它们能帮法师记录自己的法术内容。

original: And more importantly,[p/] they act as indisputable evidence in court.
translation: 更重要的是，[p/]它们也是审理中毋庸置疑的证据。

original: Tyrion: I didn't know that you were learning to cast [b]Detect Magic[/b] this morning.
translation: Tyrion: 我还不知道早上你在学习使用[b]法术探测[/b]。

original: Celeste: Ruby asked me to.[p/] She doesn't really trust the Inquisition, after all.
translation: Celeste: 是鲁比让我学的。[p/]毕竟她不怎么相信裁判所。

original: You should probably thank her for that later.[p/] Being able to see magical traces will be instrumental in your future cases.
translation: 你晚些时候得谢谢她。[p/]能看见魔法痕迹对未来的案件也很重要。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about [i]this[/i], Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，你怎么看？

original: Celeste: Ah...[p/] Sorry, Tyrion.
translation: Celeste: 呃……[p/]对不起，提利昂。

original: Celeste: I don't think I can help you with that.
translation: Celeste: 我不觉得能帮什么忙。

original: It’s been a few hours since Wallace was arrested.
translation: 距华莱士被逮捕已经过了几个小时了。

original: You and Celeste were with him during the lockdown.[p/] So the Inquisition had to take your statements.
translation: 你和塞莱斯特在封锁期间一直与他在一起。[p/]所以裁判所需要找你们做笔录。

original: But the more they questioned you,[p/] the more you could tell that they had doubts about your testimony.
translation: 但他们提的问题越多，[p/]你越能感到他们对你的证词有所怀疑。

original: You will need to do more if you want to establish an alibi for Wallace.
translation: 你们的证词还不够让华莱士的不在场证明成立。

original: CELESTE: *sigh*[p/] [i]That[/i] took longer than I expected.
translation: CELESTE: *叹气* [p/]比我想的<u>还要</u>久。

original: TYRION: We’ve already lost a lot of time talking to the Inquisition…
translation: TYRION: 我们已经在裁判所的问话上损失了很多时间……

original: TYRION: But we should be free to roam around now.
translation: TYRION: 但我们应该可以自由活动了。

original: CELESTE: Where should we go first?
translation: CELESTE: 我们应该先去哪里？

original: TYRION: The crime scene sounds like a good start.
translation: TYRION: 犯罪现场应该是一个好的起点。

original: TYRION: We still need to figure out what actually happened.
translation: TYRION: 我们还是需要搞清楚到底发生了什么。

original: CELESTE: Ruby said that the body was found in Lecture Hall 2-B.
translation: CELESTE: 鲁比说过尸体是在 2-B 讲堂被找到的。

original: Celeste: It's in the west wing of the school.
translation: Celeste: 在学院大楼的西翼。

original: Tyrion: Alright...[p/] That seems like a good place to start.
translation: Tyrion: 好的……[p/]从这里开始应该没错。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Are you okay?
translation: Tyrion: ……你还好吗？

original: Celeste: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...
translation: Celeste: ……好、[p/][s/]好啊。

original: Tyrion: ...Are you still worried about Eris?
translation: Tyrion: ……你还在担心厄莉斯的事情吗？

original: Celeste: I'm [i]really[/i] trying not to be scared of her.[p/] But I just can't help it.
translation: Celeste: 我<u>已经</u>很努力不要害怕她了。[p/]但我还是忍不住。

original: Celeste: And having to talk to her in the [i]cemetery[/i] isn't helping...
translation: Celeste: 而且和她在<u>墓园</u>说话更吓人了……

original: Tyrion: There's still a lot we don't know...
translation: Tyrion: 我们还有很多不清楚的事情……

original: Celeste: Yeah...
translation: Celeste: 对啊……

original: Celeste: We [i]know[/i] that Wallace didn't kill her.[p/] But did the true killer really murder her there?
translation: Celeste: 我们<u>知道</u>华莱士没有杀她。[p/]但杀手真的是在讲堂杀掉她的吗？

original: Right...[p/] You'll need to go there to find out more.
translation: 是的……[p/]你需要弄清楚更多现场情况。

original: Celeste: I wonder why Steelwind isn't helping us this time.
translation: Celeste: 我在想斯蒂尔文德这次为什么不帮我们了。

original: Tyrion: She had no problem giving us information before...
translation: Tyrion: 她以前在给我们情报的时候挺干脆的……

original: Tyrion: Something must be different this time.
translation: Tyrion: 这次一定有些不同的背景。

original: Celeste: ...I can't stop thinking about that story the commander told us.
translation: Celeste: ……我还是忍不住在想指挥官告诉我们的那个故事。

original: Tyrion: I'm sure he's just exaggerating...
translation: Tyrion: 我确信他就是在夸大其词……

original: Tyrion: There's no way someone could [i]really[/i] use magic to control people's minds.
translation: Tyrion: 不可能有人<u>真的</u>能使用魔法操控别人。

original: Although...[p/] You clearly have an ability to [i]read[/i] people's minds.
translation: 虽然吧……[p/]你确实有能力<u>阅读</u>别人的想法。

original: So, it's not [i]too[/i] out there...
translation: 所以这好像也没<u>那么</u>夸张……

original: Celeste: In a way,[p/] Steelwind was trying to protect us.
translation: Celeste: 从某种意义上来说，[p/]斯蒂尔文德是想要保护我们。

original: Tyrion: ...I appreciate the gesture.[p/] But we need to talk with Miriam if we want to find out more.
translation: Tyrion: ……我感谢她的善意，[p/]但为了找出更多事实，我们需要和米莉亚姆交谈。

original: Celeste: Just be careful.[p/] Dealing with a member of a Pillar Family could be dangerous for a [i]lot[/i] of reasons.
translation: Celeste: 就是要小心一点。[p/]与“四大支柱”家族的一员打交道，可能会有<u>很多</u>危险。

original: Celeste: Where should we go next?
translation: Celeste: 我们接下来去哪儿？

original: Tyrion: I don't think we've gotten all the information we need out of Eris.
translation: Tyrion: 我认为厄莉斯那里还有我们没获得的信息。

original: Tyrion: We should head back to the cemetery.
translation: Tyrion: 我们应该回到墓园。

original: Tyrion: The prosecution believes that Wallace killed Bellwether in the Library.
translation: Tyrion: 检察官确信是华莱士在图书馆杀死了贝尔维瑟。

original: Tyrion: We didn't really investigate that room the first time around.
translation: Tyrion: 我们一开始没机会好好调查那个房间。

original: Tyrion: We might be able to find some new leads there.
translation: Tyrion: 或许能在哪里发现新的线索。

original: Tyrion: Steelwind isn't cooperating with us,[p/] but I don't think I have enough information to ARGUE with her.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德不愿合作，[p/]但我不认为现在有足够的信息<size=1.5em>说服</size>她。

original: Tyrion: We should head somewhere else in the meantime.
translation: Tyrion: 现在应该先去别的地方。

original: Tyrion: We found a decent amount of information with Commander White's help.
translation: Tyrion: 在怀特指挥官的帮助下，我们得到了数量可观的信息。

original: Tyrion: I think we finally have enough information to ARGUE with Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 我们应该有足够的信息<size=1.5em>说服</size>斯蒂尔文德了。

original: ...You just hope she'll finally be receptive to you.
translation: ……你只能希望她最后会愿意敞开心扉。

original: Tyrion: Steelwind finally told us about Miriam Frega.[p/] And we even know where her dorm room is.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德终于告诉我们米莉亚姆·弗雷加的事了。[p/]我们现在也知道她的宿舍在哪里。

original: Tyrion: We should head there and TALK to her.
translation: Tyrion: 我们得赶过去与她<size=1.5em>交谈</size> 。

original: Tyrion: It's the entrance to a lecture hall.
translation: Tyrion: 这是讲堂的入口。

original: Tyrion: The door says that it's Lecture Hall 2-D.
translation: Tyrion: 门上写着 2-D 讲堂。

original: Tyrion: It's the entrance to a lecture hall.
translation: Tyrion: 这是讲堂的入口。

original: Tyrion: The door says that it's Lecture Hall 2-B.
translation: Tyrion: 门上写着 2-B 讲堂。

original: Tyrion: This is the lecture hall where Bellwether's body was found.
translation: Tyrion: 这就是贝尔维瑟的尸体被发现的那间讲堂。

original: Tyrion: It's the entrance to a lecture hall.
translation: Tyrion: 这是讲堂的入口。

original: Tyrion: The door says that it's Lecture Hall 2-F.
translation: Tyrion: 门上写着 2-F 讲堂。

original: Tyrion: It's the entrance to a lecture hall.
translation: Tyrion: 这是讲堂的入口。

original: Tyrion: The door says that it's Lecture Hall 2-H.
translation: Tyrion: 门上写着 2-H 讲堂。

original: Tyrion: It's a door that leads into some kind of storage closet.
translation: Tyrion: 这扇门背后是某种储藏柜。

original: Tyrion: There doesn't appear to be anything of note inside.
translation: Tyrion: 里面似乎没有什么值得注意的东西。

original: TYRION: So, Jan.[p/] Are you a part of the staff here?
translation: TYRION: 简，[p/]你是这里的教职工？

original: JAN: Yep…[p/] I’m a janitor…
translation: JAN: 对的……[p/]我算个清洁工……

original: JAN: I clean…[p/] and I do odd jobs here and there…
translation: JAN: 就打扫卫生……[p/]然后做一些杂活……

original: JAN: ...
translation: JAN: ……

original: TYRION: ...
translation: TYRION: ……

original: JAN: …
translation: JAN: ……

original: Well...[p/] Apparently, that’s all he has to say about that.
translation: 好吧……[p/]很明显，这就是他想说的全部内容了。

original: TYRION: Valerie mentioned that you were close to Lecture Hall 2-B before they found Bellwether.
translation: TYRION: 瓦莱丽提到，她们找到贝尔维瑟之前，你就在 2-B 讲堂附近。

original: TYRION: What were you doing when the twins discovered the body?
translation: TYRION: 那对双胞胎发现尸体的时候你在干什么？

original: JAN: I was cleaning the halls.
translation: JAN: 我当时正在打扫大厅。

original: JAN: Bellwether knocked over a vase…[p/] And there were shards and dirt everywhere.
translation: JAN: 贝尔维瑟撞倒了一个花瓶……[p/]搞得满地都是碎片和泥土。

original: TYRION: Wait…[p/] You [s/][i]saw[/i] the professor before the twins arrived?
translation: TYRION: 等等……[p/]你[s/]在双胞胎到来之前<u>看到了</u>教授？

original: JAN: Yeah.[p/] Like I said,[p/] she broke the vase right in this hallway…
translation: JAN: 是啊。[p/]我刚才说过了，[p/]她把走廊里的花瓶打碎了……

original: JAN: It was probably 20-30 minutes before the twins found the body.
translation: JAN: 大概是在那对双胞胎发现尸体 20 到 30 分钟之前。

original: TYRION: You might have been the last person to see her alive.
translation: TYRION: 你可能就是最后一个看到她还活着的人。

original: TYRION: Did you see where she went after breaking the vase?
translation: TYRION: 你有看到她打碎花瓶后去哪里了吗？

original: JAN: Yeah,[p/] I think she went into that room over there.
translation: JAN: 有啊，[p/]我记得她走进那边那个房间了吧。

original: Jan points to the lecture hall that Bellwether was found in.
translation: 简指向贝尔维瑟被发现的那间讲堂。

original: TYRION: Did you see anyone else enter the lecture hall?
translation: TYRION: 你有看到其他人进入那间讲堂吗？

original: JAN: I’m honestly not sure.
translation: JAN: 我真的不怎么确定。

original: JAN: I was more worried about cleaning the mess she made.
translation: JAN: 我当时急着清理她搞出来的那一地垃圾。

original: TYRION: Well…[p/] Did you notice anything off about her?
translation: TYRION: 行吧……[p/]她看起来有什么不对劲吗？

original: JAN: She [i]was[/i] in a pretty bad mood.
translation: JAN: 她心情<u>真的</u>很差。

original: JAN: But honestly,[p/] that’s pretty normal for her.
translation: JAN: 但老实说，[p/]她这个样子才正常。

original: JAN: She was walking real slow.
translation: JAN: 她当时走得很慢。

original: JAN: I didn’t notice her at first and she basically shoved me out of her way.
translation: JAN: 我一开始没注意到挡了她路，然后她基本上算是给我一把推开了。

original: JAN: After that,[p/] she knocked over that vase.
translation: JAN: 紧接着，[p/]她就撞翻了花瓶。

original: JAN: I didn’t even say anything after that,[p/] but she still yelled at me to "Be quiet!".
translation: JAN: 我什么都没说，[p/]但她却向我大吼“安静！”

original: Tyrion: Did you see where she went after that?
translation: Tyrion: 你有看到她之后去了哪里吗？

original: Jan: Not really...[p/] But the only thing in that direction is Lecture Hall 2-B.
translation: Jan: 不太清楚……[p/]但是那个方向只有 2-B 讲堂。

original: Jan: I can't imagine her going anywhere else.
translation: Jan: 我想不出她还能去哪里。

original: TYRION: What can you tell me about Catherine Bellwether?
translation: TYRION: 你能跟我说说凯瑟琳·贝尔维瑟的事情吗？

original: TYRION: I've heard that she had a pretty bad relationship with the staff.
translation: TYRION: 我听说她和教职工们关系很差。

original: JAN: She had a “bad relationship” with just about everyone.
translation: JAN: 她差不多和所有人都“关系很差”。

original: JAN: Students,[p/] the other teachers,[p/] I can’t think of many people who actually [i]did[/i] get along with her.
