original: You look carefully across the list and find some notable student names.
translation: 你仔细查看名单，发现上面有几个值得注意的学生姓名。

original: Wallace Nightgrave
translation: 华莱士·奈特格雷夫

original: You open Wallace’s locker.
translation: 你打开了华莱士的储物柜。

original: Inside,[p/] you find a bottle of fragrant liquid and something that looks like a makeup kit.
translation: 在里面，[p/]你发现一瓶香气扑鼻的液体，还有一个看着像化妆包的东西。

original: CELESTE: Huh…[p/] I didn’t expect Wallace to use stuff like this.
translation: CELESTE: 哈……[p/]我没想到华莱士还用这种东西啊。

original: It [i]does[/i] seem strange.[p/] But it's not your place to judge.
translation: 看起来<u>确实</u>奇怪。[p/]但这不是你该评判的事情。

original: Anyways,[p/] you should try looking through the other lockers.
translation: 总之，[p/]你应该试着检查一下其他的储物柜。

original: Miriam Frega
translation: 米莉亚姆·弗雷加

original: You open the locker with Miriam Frega’s ID number.
translation: 你打开上面贴着米莉亚姆·弗雷加名牌的储物柜。

original: Inside,[p/] you find a stack of worn-out textbooks and notebooks.
translation: 在里面，[p/]你发现一叠破旧的教科书与笔记本。

original: TYRION: Wait a minute…
translation: TYRION: 等等……

original: TYRION: These notebooks all have Wallace’s name on them.
translation: TYRION: 这些笔记本上都写着华莱士的名字。

original: You open the notebook and look through its pages.
translation: 你打开笔记本并翻阅里面的书页。

original: It appears to be research on the art of [b]necromancy[/b].
translation: 看起来是一些关于[b]死灵术[/b]的研究内容。

original: TYRION: These are…[p/] Wallace’s notebooks.
translation: TYRION: 这些是……[p/]华莱士的笔记本。

original: CELESTE: But why are they in Miriam Frega’s locker?
translation: CELESTE: 但为什么在米莉亚姆·弗雷加的储物柜里？

original: CELESTE: Did Miriam steal his things?
translation: CELESTE: 米莉亚姆偷了他的东西？

original: What’s going on here?
translation: 到底怎么回事？

original: You and Celeste check the locker more thoroughly.
translation: 你和塞莱斯特更仔细地检查储物柜。

original: CELESTE: Wait a minute…
translation: CELESTE: 等一下……

original: CELESTE: Tyrion![p/][s/] Take a look at this!
translation: CELESTE: 提利昂！[p/][s/]看看这个！

original: TYRION: That’s…[p/][s/] blood!
translation: TYRION: 那是……[p/][s/]血啊！

original: Jaiden von Sanctus
translation: 杰登·冯·桑克图斯

original: You open Jaiden von Sanctus’ locker.
translation: 你打开杰登·冯·桑克图斯的储物柜。

original: Inside,[p/] you find several bottles of some kind of transparent lotion.
translation: 在里面，[p/]你发现几瓶透明的乳液。

original: TYRION: …There’s nothing but lotion in here.
translation: TYRION: ……除了这种乳液什么都没有。

original: CELESTE: Oh…
translation: CELESTE: 噢……

original: TYRION: I wonder why a student would need this much lotion.
translation: TYRION: 我在想一个学生需要这么多乳液干嘛。

original: CELESTE: …
translation: CELESTE: ……

original: You take one of the bottles to inspect it more closely.
translation: 你拿起其中一瓶，更仔细地检查起来。

original: CELESTE: W-[p/][s/]Wait, Tyrion![p/][s/] Don’t touch those with your hands!
translation: CELESTE: 等、[p/][s/]等下啊，提利昂！[p/][s/]别直接用手碰！

original: TYRION: It’s some kind of sanitizing liquid.
translation: TYRION: 这是某种消毒液吧。

original: TYRION: It’s a little strange…[p/] but it doesn’t seem to be related to the case.
translation: TYRION: 有点奇怪……[p/]但看起来与案件无关。

original: Warren Sibyl
translation: 沃伦·希比尔

original: You open Warren Sibyl’s locker.
translation: 你打开了沃伦·希比尔的储物柜。

original: Inside,[p/] you find some textbooks and a neatly stacked deck of tarot cards.
translation: 在里面，[p/]你发现几本教材和一沓叠放整齐的塔罗牌。

original: CELESTE: Oh.[p/] It’s like those cards that fortune tellers use.
translation: CELESTE: 噢。[p/]这像是算命先生用的那种卡牌。

original: TYRION: I wonder if this student studies [b]divination[/b] magic.
translation: TYRION: 我在想这个学生是不是学习[b]占卜术[/b]的。

original: TYRION: But anyways,[p/] I don’t think this is related to the case.
translation: TYRION: 不管怎么说，[p/]我不觉得这和案件有关。

original: Back
translation: 返回

original: There are several lockers in this room.
translation: 房间里有好几个储物柜。

original: It'd be impossible to search through them all.
translation: 全部搜查一遍是不可能的。

original: You should speak with Commander White before trying to search through them.
translation: 试着搜查它们之前，你应该和怀特指挥官谈一谈。

original: TYRION: What was the headmaster talking to you about?
translation: TYRION: 校长之前在和你说什么？

original: ORYM: Supposedly,[p/] he has some items stored in one of the faculty lockers.
translation: ORYM: 据说，[p/]他在某个教职工的储物柜里存放了一些道具。

original: ORYM: The problem is,[p/] Steelwind said no one gets in or out of this room.
translation: ORYM: 问题是，[p/]斯蒂尔文德说过谁都不能进出这个房间。

original: ORYM: …Except for her and you two, apparently.
translation: ORYM: ……但显然，她自己和你们两个除外。

original: ORYM: She won’t even let the other knights in here.
translation: ORYM: 她甚至都不让其他骑士进来。

original: TYRION: Really?[p/] Is that normal?
translation: TYRION: 真的吗？[p/]这很常见吗？

original: ORYM: Nope.[p/] But things rarely are when she’s calling the shots.
translation: ORYM: 并不。[p/]但她发号施令的时候少有常见状况。

original: Why would she give [i]you[/i] access to the crime scene if she wasn’t even letting the knights in?
translation: 如果她都不让骑士们进来，为什么要允许<u>你们</u>进入犯罪现场呢？

original: ORYM: I don’t know what her deal is,[p/] but she’s been acting strange lately.
translation: ORYM: 我不知道她在打什么算盘，[p/]但她最近的行动都很奇怪。

original: ORYM: She’s been real paranoid, that girl.
translation: ORYM: 她这小姑娘真是疑神疑鬼的。

original: ORYM: Frankly,[p/] I can't tell what’s going through her head.
translation: ORYM: 说实话，[p/]我不知道她脑子里在想什么。

original: TYRION: You mentioned that the prosecutor has been paranoid lately.
translation: TYRION: 你提到检察官最近疑神疑鬼。

original: TYRION: Do you think it has something to do with this case?
translation: TYRION: 你觉得会和这件案子有什么关系吗？

original: ORYM: Nah.[p/] It started way before that.
translation: ORYM: 没吧。[p/]在这之前就开始了。

original: ORYM: Lately,[p/] she’s been using the Inquisition to investigate a lot of non-magical homicides.
translation: ORYM: 最近这段时间，[p/]她使唤裁判所调查了很多与魔法无关的凶杀案。

original: TYRION: What…?[p/] Wouldn’t it be easier to work with the relevant law enforcement for that?
translation: TYRION: 什么……？[p/]让当地执法部门处理不是更方便吗？

original: ORYM: I don’t know why,[p/] but she’s convinced that these cases have magic involved.
translation: ORYM: 我不知道为什么，[p/]但她确信那些案件有涉及魔法。

original: ORYM: But we scanned each and every one of those crime scenes.[p/] Nothing turned up.
translation: ORYM: 我们详细扫描了每个犯罪现场，[p/]却什么都没发现。

original: ORYM: …I got to say, though.[p/] If it weren’t for the scans,[p/] I might actually agree with her.
translation: ORYM: ……不过我还是得说一下，[p/]如果不是有扫描结果，[p/]我可能会赞同她。

original: TYRION: Why do you say that?
translation: TYRION: 你为何这么说？

original: ORYM: Those homicides…[p/] I haven’t ever seen [i]anything[/i] like them.
translation: ORYM: 那些凶杀案……[p/]我从没见过搞成<u>那个样子</u>的。

original: ORYM: They’re probably some of the most screwed-up cases I’ve ever handled.
translation: ORYM: 它们可能是我处理过最为惨不忍睹的案件。

original: ORYM: For one of those cases,[p/] we had ourselves a disgruntled spouse.
translation: ORYM: 其中一例案件里，[p/]凶手是一个不满的配偶。

original: ORYM: She found out that her man was going around with a barkeep.
translation: ORYM: 她发现自己的男人和一个酒保混在一起。

original: ORYM: And you know what the spouse does?[p/] She stalks the poor woman.
translation: ORYM: 你知道她干了什么吗？[p/]她跟踪了那个可怜的女人。

original: Orym: She starts leaving threatening notes all around where she worked.
translation: Orym: 她开始在那酒保工作的地方留下各种威胁字条。

original: Orym: The barkeep told the City Watch all about what was happening.
translation: Orym: 酒保向城市安保报案。

original: Orym: But no matter how much they staked out the tavern,[p/] they could never catch the perp.
translation: Orym: 但无论他们在酒馆里如何布置抓捕，[p/]始终没能抓到罪犯。

original: Orym: Then one day,[p/] the barkeep arrived home.
translation: Orym: 之后有一天，[p/]酒保工作结束后回家。

original: Orym: But little did she know,[p/] the spouse was waiting there for her.
translation: Orym: 她不知道的是，[p/]那个人就在她家等着。

original: Orym: The poor lady never had a chance.
translation: Orym: 可怜的酒保毫无胜算。

original: ORYM: Then to tie the whole thing together,[p/] the spouse waits for her husband to get home.
translation: ORYM: 这件事的结尾是，[p/]犯人回家等待丈夫归来。

original: Orym: She cooks him a big roast...[p/] using the barkeep's remains.
translation: Orym: 她给他做了一顿烤肉……[p/]用酒保的尸体。

original: CELESTE: Wow…[p/] That story is pretty…
translation: CELESTE: 哇哦……[p/]这故事可真……

original: ORYM: I know.
translation: ORYM: 我知道。

original: ORYM: Steelwind thinks someone’s developed a new type of magic that can control people’s minds.
translation: ORYM: 斯蒂尔文德坚信，某人研发出了某种能操控他人意识的魔法。

original: ORYM: And these homicides were some kind of sick test run.
translation: ORYM: 这些谋杀只是某种恶心的测试。

original: …Magic that can control people’s minds?
translation: ……能操控他人意识的魔法？

original: Celeste: But wouldn't Mageblight make more sense?
translation: Celeste: 但法师之疫不是更说得通一点吗？

original: Tyrion: Mageblight?
translation: Tyrion: 法师之疫？

original: Celeste: When a mage overuses their magic,[p/] it can have pretty bad consequences on their mind.
translation: Celeste: 如果一个法师过度使用魔法，[p/]他的精神会受到严重影响。

original: Celeste: They temporarily lose grip of reality,[p/] and begin seeing things that aren't there.
translation: Celeste: 他们会暂时失去对现实的感知，[p/]开始出现幻觉。

original: Celeste: When a mage becomes like that,[p/] it almost never ends well.
translation: Celeste: 当一个法师变成那样，[p/]通常都不会有好结果。

original: Celeste: They enter a frenzy and begin firing spells randomly,[p/] which only makes it worse.
translation: Celeste: 他们会进入狂暴阶段，并开始随机释放法术，[p/]这只会让情况更糟。

original: Orym: I've seen my fair share of Mageblight cases.[p/] And [i]this[/i] isn’t like that.
translation: Orym: 我见过不少法师之疫的案件，[p/]和<u>这一系列</u>的案子不一样。

original: ORYM: Not all of the perps were mages.[p/] And the ones that were,[p/] didn’t even use their magic.
translation: ORYM: 并非所有的犯人都是法师。[p/]就算犯人是法师，[p/]也没有在行凶时使用魔法。

original: ORYM: One thing was that each of the perps almost seemed to wake up after we arrested them.
translation: ORYM: 不过有个共同点，我们逮捕的犯人都似乎是刚刚回复意识的样子。

original: ORYM: All of them said things like [s/]“It wasn’t me!”[p/] or [s/]“I didn't have a choice!”.
translation: ORYM: 他们都会说诸如[s/]“那不是我！”[p/]或[s/]“我没得选！”这种话。

original: TYRION: They "didn't have a choice"?[p/] What could that mean?
translation: TYRION: 他们“没得选”？[p/]这是何意？

original: ORYM: I doubt it "means" anything.
translation: ORYM: 我不觉得这有什么特殊含义。

original: ORYM: Sometimes people can’t face the things they’ve done.
translation: ORYM: 有时人们无法面对自己的所作所为。

original: ORYM: It’s easier to say that you had no control than to take responsibility.
translation: ORYM: 比起担负责任，说自己当时失控要更轻松点。

original: You wonder if you can mislead the commander into revealing who the secret witness is.
translation: 你好奇能否误导指挥官，从他这里套出那个神秘目击者的身份。

original: TYRION: During the trial,[p/] Ms. Steelwind mentioned that someone other than Jan Hughes saw Bellwether walking around.
translation: TYRION: 庭审中，[p/]斯蒂尔文德女士提到，除简·休斯外还有一位目击到贝尔维瑟走动的人。

original: TYRION: Have you seen them around lately?[p/] We wanted to speak with them.
translation: TYRION: 你最近有看到他吗？[p/]我们想和他聊聊。

original: ORYM: …
translation: ORYM: ……

original: ORYM: Hah.[p/] Nice try, kid.
translation: ORYM: 哈！[p/]想得美，小子。

original: Well…[p/] It was worth a shot.
translation: 好吧……[p/]至少试了试。

original: ORYM: Honestly,[p/] I couldn’t tell you if I wanted to.
translation: ORYM: 说实话，[p/]就算我想，也没办法告诉你。

original: ORYM: I don’t think anyone other than Steelwind knows who this witness is.
translation: ORYM: 我觉得除了斯蒂尔文德外没人知道那证人是谁。

original: ORYM: [i]I[/i] sure as hell don’t.
translation: ORYM: 反正<u>我</u>是不知道。

original: What?[p/] She’s even hiding it from the Inquisition Commander?
translation: 什么？[p/]她甚至连裁判所的指挥官都瞒着？

original: Why is she being so secretive?
translation: 她怎么神神秘秘的？

original: Orym: I didn't expect to see you two again so soon.
translation: Orym: 没想到这么快就又见到你们俩了。

original: Tyrion: Considering our careers,[p/] we'll probably be seeing a lot more of each other.
translation: Tyrion: 由于工作原因，[p/]我们将来可能会经常碰面。

original: Orym: ...Well, between you and Tymora,[p/] [i]you're[/i] a lot less insufferable to be around.
translation: Orym: ……至少，跟泰摩拉比起来，[p/]<u>你</u>没那么难以忍受。

original: Tyrion: Thanks...[p/] I think?
translation: Tyrion: 多谢夸奖……[p/]这算夸奖吗？

original: Orym: I was surprised to see [i]you[/i] again, mage girl.
translation: Orym: 没想到我跟<u>你</u>又见面了，法师小姑娘。

original: Celeste: I have a name, you know.
translation: Celeste: 我说，我有名字的。

original: Orym: Yeah, yeah...
translation: Orym: 行，随便你……

original: Orym: So, what you doing around the kid [i]this[/i] time?
translation: Orym: 那<u>这回</u>你跟这小子怎么凑到一起的？

original: Orym: Are you two...?
translation: Orym: 难不成你们两个……？

original: Celeste: I'm working as Tyrion's bodyguard now.
translation: Celeste: 我现在是提利昂的贴身护卫。

original: Orym: Really?[p/] With [i]your[/i] record?
translation: Orym: 真的假的？[p/]那么战果累累的<u>你</u>？

original: Orym: I figured you'd be back in the Eastern Kingdoms after your acquittal.
translation: Orym: 我还以为你无罪释放之后，会回到东方古国呢。

original: Celeste: No.[p/] I'm trying to keep my work in Wyverngarde for now.
translation: Celeste: 没有。[p/]我目前正努力在维文加德站稳脚跟。

original: Celeste: My mom's all alone after what happened...
translation: Celeste: 案发之后，家里就只剩我妈一个人了……

original: Orym: ...Right.
translation: Orym: ……也是。

original: Orym: Man...[p/] Steelwind's really wound up today.
translation: Orym: 老天啊……[p/]斯蒂尔文德今天神经兮兮的。

original: Orym: I don't know what her deal is...
translation: Orym: 不知道她葫芦里装的什么药……

original: Tyrion: Is she not normally like this?
translation: Tyrion: 她平时不这样吗？

original: Orym: Not usually.
translation: Orym: 她一般不这样。

original: Orym: Or at least not [i]this[/i] much.
translation: Orym: 至少没<u>今天</u>这么夸张。

original: Orym: By the way,[p/] have you two seen Eris Illmater around?
translation: Orym: 话说，[p/]你们俩在这附近见到过厄莉斯·伊尔马特吗？

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] Steelwind mentioned what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 说到这个……[p/]斯蒂尔文德提到过当时的情况。

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] She has really been on my case about that.
translation: Orym: 嗯，[p/]她因为这事一直数落我。

original: Orym: I can't believe I lost her [b]Compendium[/b]...
translation: Orym: 我自己都难以置信，我竟然会弄丢她的[b]法术汇编[/b]……

original: Orym: But I guess it's mostly my fault.
translation: Orym: 但我想，这也只能怪我自己吧。

original: Tyrion: We saw her at the cemetery earlier,[p/] but I have no idea where she is now.
translation: Tyrion: 我们刚才在墓地附近见过她一面，[p/]也不知道她现在上哪儿去了。

original: Orym: Damn it...
translation: Orym: 可恶……

original: Orym: Look, kid...[p/] I know you always "believe in your clients" and all, but...
translation: Orym: 听我说，小子……[p/]我知道你总爱搞“相信你的委托人”那一套，不过……

original: Orym: I can't believe you're defending a [i]necromancer[/i] of all people.
translation: Orym: 我真不敢相信，这么多人挑谁不好，你偏挑个<u>死灵法师</u>辩护……

original: Orym: There [i]has[/i] to be a limit to that “compassion” of yours.
translation: Orym: 你“普渡众生”也要有个<u>限度</u>吧。

original: Tyrion: Wallace has his reasons for studying [b]necromancy[/b].[p/] I trust him.
translation: Tyrion: 华莱士研习[b]死灵术[/b]另有隐情。[p/]我相信他。

original: Orym: Even though you just met him yesterday?
translation: Orym: 你和他不是昨天才刚认识吗？

original: Tyrion: I think that I'm a good judge of character.[p/] There's no way he killed Bellwether.
translation: Tyrion: 我觉得自己看人很准。[p/]贝尔维瑟不可能是他杀的。

original: Orym: Whatever you say, kid.
translation: Orym: 你说准就准吧，小子。

original: Tyrion: Was there really no way for you to breach the academy during the lockdown?
translation: Tyrion: 你们真的没办法在封锁生效时期强行突破进入学院吗？

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] Those [b]abjuration[/b] barriers are top-notch.
translation: Orym: 没办法。[p/]这些[b]防护术[/b]生成的护壁是一流的。

original: Orym: They were paid for by the nobility, after all.
translation: Orym: 毕竟这可是众贵族赞助的。

original: Orym: I bet Lucio Steelwind could drop a meteor on it,[p/] and it wouldn't even make a dent.
translation: Orym: 我估计就算是卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德往上面丢一个陨石，[p/]它也不会破碎分毫。

original: Celeste: I’m sorry…[p/] He could drop a [i]what[/i]?!
translation: Celeste: 抱歉我没听清……[p/]他能丢个<u>什么</u>？！

original: Orym: Ugh...[p/] Those twins really screwed me over with what they did.
translation: Orym: 呃啊……[p/]那对双胞胎耍的小把戏可真把我整惨了。

original: Orym: Steelwind's going to hold this over me for a while.
translation: Orym: 斯蒂尔文德又要拿这件事数落我了。

original: Tyrion: I can't exactly blame you for what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 我也不能全怪你。

original: Tyrion: Twins are such a rare occurrence.[p/] I doubt even the Inquisition has dealt with that before.
translation: Tyrion: 双胞胎本就是罕见事件，[p/]我怀疑裁判所以前从未经手过类似的案件。

original: Orym: Ugh...[p/] You always know just how to piss off the right people, kid.
translation: Orym: 呃啊……[p/]小子，你可真是会惹人不爽。

original: Orym: We're [i]still[/i] trying to clean up the mess you made with House Pierce.
translation: Orym: 我们<u>还</u>在处理你对皮尔斯家惹出来的乱子。

original: Tyrion: I won't let anyone stop me from getting justice for Wallace.
translation: Tyrion: 没有人能阻挡我为华莱士讨回公道。

original: Tyrion: It doesn't matter if they're a man,[p/] king,[p/] or god.
translation: Tyrion: 无谓人、[p/]王、[p/]亦或是神。

original: Orym: ...Damn.[p/] That's pretty...[p/] extreme.
translation: Orym: ……该死。[p/]这真是……[p/]太极端了。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]Sorry,[p/] I've been saying that since I was a child.
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/]抱歉，[p/]我从小就一直那么说。

original: Tyrion: I suppose that it's become a habit...
translation: Tyrion: 我估计已经变成固定台词了……

original: Celeste: [i]I[/i] think it's pretty cool.
translation: Celeste: <u>我</u>觉得蛮酷的。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about this, Commander White?
translation: Tyrion: 你对这个有什么看法？怀特指挥官。

original: Orym: Sorry, kid.[p/] I don't have much to say about that.
translation: Orym: 不好意思，小子。[p/]对此我没什么要说的。

original: You spend some time wandering through the academy when you overhear a conversation from a nearby room.
translation: 你花了些时间在学院四处转悠，突然听到附近房间里的对话声。

original: THEODORE: From what I understand,[p/] Ms. Steelwind has already moved the investigation elsewhere.
translation: THEODORE: 据我所知，[p/]斯蒂尔文德女士已经去其他地方调查了。

original: THEODORE: How long must I wait before I can retrieve my things?
translation: THEODORE: 我还要等多久才能取回我的东西？

original: ORYM: Sorry, old-timer.[p/] Orders are orders.
translation: ORYM: 抱歉，老前辈。[p/]但命令就是命令。

original: ORYM: Nothing comes in or out till this case is over and done with.
translation: ORYM: 在此案结案之前，没有任何人能进出这里。

original: TYRION: Commander White?[p/] And the headmaster too?
translation: TYRION: 怀特指挥官？[p/]校长也在？

original: THEODORE: Oh…[p/] Hello, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: THEODORE: 哦……[p/]你好，卡斯伯特先生。

original: ORYM: Hey, kid.
translation: ORYM: 哟，小子。

original: THEODORE: *sigh*[p/] In any case,[p/] there are other matters I must attend to.
translation: THEODORE: *叹气* [p/]总之，[p/]我还有事要办。

original: THEODORE: Please inform me when I can reclaim my things.
translation: THEODORE: 能取回物品的时候请通知我。

original: ORYM: Sure.
translation: ORYM: 当然。

original: It looks like Commander White is standing guard in front of this locker room.
translation: 看起来怀特指挥官在储物柜室前值守。

original: And it doesn't look like he's conducting [i]any[/i] sort of investigation.
translation: 他也不像是在进行<u>任何</u>调查。

original: Is he here on Steelwind’s orders?
translation: 他待在这里也是斯蒂尔文德的命令吗？

original: He might be able to tell you who this secret witness is.
translation: 或许他能告诉你那个神秘的目击者是谁。

original: It looks like the commander doesn’t know who this secret witness is, either.
translation: 看起来指挥官也不知道这个神秘的目击者是谁。

original: CELESTE: Ugh…[p/] This isn’t getting us anywhere…
translation: CELESTE: 呃啊……[p/]毫无进展……

original: TYRION: Steelwind’s behavior [i]is[/i] strange, though.
translation: TYRION: 不过斯蒂尔文德的行为<u>确实</u>很奇怪。

original: Perhaps you could try analyzing her behavior.
translation: 或许你应该试着分析下她的行为。

original: If you do that,[p/] you might be able to find a way to convince her to help you.
translation: 或许分析过后，[p/]能找到说服她帮助你的办法。

original: TYRION: Okay.[p/] Steelwind’s behavior has been strange this time around.
translation: TYRION: 好了。[p/]这次斯蒂尔文德的行为一直很怪。

original: TYRION: She’s hiding elements of the case,[p/] even from the commander.
translation: TYRION: 她在刻意隐瞒关于此案的一些细节，[p/]就连指挥官都瞒着。

original: TYRION: Anyone can tell that she doesn’t have much faith in him.
translation: TYRION: 谁都能看出来她不太相信指挥官。

original: ORYM: I’m…[p/] standing right here.
translation: ORYM: 我……[p/]可还站在这呢。

original: TYRION: But this is the first time I’ve seen her hide key details of a case from him.
translation: TYRION: 但我第一次见到她对指挥官隐瞒关键细节。

original: TYRION: There has to be a reason why she’s being so secretive.
translation: TYRION: 她作风这么神秘，肯定有什么原因。

original: No…[p/] Steelwind might have a habit of micromanaging the Inquisition.
translation: 不对……[p/]斯蒂尔文德或许是有这个习惯，会事无巨细地处理裁判所的工作。

original: But she has [i]always[/i] delegated tasks to them.
translation: 但她以前<u>一直</u>会给裁判所的人分配任务。

original: But this time is different.[p/] Something is preventing her from utilizing them.
translation: 这次却不同。[p/]不知为何，她没有动用裁判所的人力。

original: No…[p/] The academy is a large building.
translation: 不……[p/]帝国学院的建筑太大了。

original: No matter how competent she is,[p/] she can’t possibly carry out a search of this scale by herself.
translation: 任凭她再有本事，[p/]也不可能一个人完成这么大规模的搜查。

original: From a logical standpoint,[p/] it would make more sense for her to utilize the entirety of the Inquisition.
translation: 按理来说，[p/]她应该动员整个裁判所帮忙搜查才对。

original: Tyrion: Her actions must be driven by paranoia.
translation: Tyrion: 她的行为肯定和疑神疑鬼的情绪有关。

original: Tyrion: She’s been hoarding information about the case.
translation: Tyrion: 她在暗中囤积本案的情报。

original: Tyrion: There’s only one reason why she wouldn’t utilize the Inquisition like she usually does.
translation: Tyrion: 她不像往常那样召集<u>裁判所</u>的人搜查，只可能有一个理由。

original: Tyrion: It’s because she doesn’t trust them.
translation: Tyrion: 那就是她不信任裁判所的人。

original: ORYM: I hate to say it,[p/] but that doesn’t really surprise me.
translation: ORYM: 我很不愿意承认，[p/]但我不意外。

original: ORYM: She’s always been standoffish with us.
translation: ORYM: 她对我们永远没个好脸色。

original: TYRION: But there [i]is[/i] one exception.
translation: TYRION: 但<u>有一个</u>例外。

original: TYRION: There are individuals who she’s trusted more than the Inquisition during this case.
translation: TYRION: 这个案子里，比起裁判所，她有更信任的人。

original: No…[p/] She’s been personally investigating the crime herself.
translation: 不对……[p/]她一直独自调查案情。

original: She hasn’t let anyone into the crime scene,[p/] not even the Inquisition.
translation: 她不让任何人靠近犯罪现场，[p/]裁判所也不例外。

original: But there [i]have[/i] been individuals that she’s trusted to enter the crime scene.
translation: 可她<u>确实</u>对少数人十分信任，愿意放他们进入犯罪现场。

original: TYRION: She let us investigate the crime scenes without any restrictions.
translation: TYRION: 她愿意让我们随便调查犯罪现场，完全不设任何限制。

original: CELESTE: …Yeah,[p/] I never really thought about that.
translation: CELESTE: ……是啊，[p/]我之前都没想过。

original: CELESTE: Does she trust us that much?
translation: CELESTE: 她有那么信任我们吗？

original: TYRION: I don’t think personal trust is the reason.
translation: TYRION: 我觉得，原因不在于她个人信不信得过我们。

original: TYRION: We don't usually interact with her.
translation: TYRION: 我们一般不和她互动。

original: TYRION: And she’s worked with the Inquisition on plenty of cases that we weren’t even involved in.
translation: TYRION: 她跟裁判所合作解决过不知多少起案子了。那些案子我们甚至都没参与过。

original: No…[p/] There’s a key difference between us and the Inquisition.
translation: 不……[p/]我们和裁判所有一处关键性的不同。

original: We don’t answer to anyone,[p/] and we aren’t subject to corruption.
translation: 我们不对任何人负责，[p/]不受腐败的影响。

original: So why would that make Steelwind trust us this time around?
translation: 那为什么斯蒂尔文德这次选择相信我们？

original: Tyrion: Steelwind doesn’t know much about us.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德虽然对我们了解不多。

original: Tyrion: But she [i]does[/i] know that we aren’t prone to noble corruption.
translation: Tyrion: 但她<u>确实</u>知道我们不会被腐败贵族影响。

original: CELESTE: Right…[p/] You indicted a noble during the last case.
translation: CELESTE: 对的……[p/]你在上一起案件中起诉了一个贵族。

original: TYRION: Meanwhile,[p/] the Inquisition usually bends to the nobility’s whims.
translation: TYRION: 与此同时，[p/]裁判所通常对贵族卑躬屈膝。

original: ORYM: Well...[p/] I can’t argue with you there.
translation: ORYM: 行吧……[p/]你说的也不无道理。

original: TYRION: Using my insight,[p/] I could tell that she’s worried about the witness’s family.
translation: TYRION: 以我的见解，[p/]她应该因证人的家庭背景而有所顾虑。

original: TYRION: And if she’s worried about corruption from the nobility,[p/] that can only mean one thing.
translation: TYRION: 如果她在担心贵族可能导致的司法腐败，[p/]那就只能意味着一件事。

original: No…[p/] We’re not controlled by the nobility.
translation: 不对……[p/]我们不受贵族控制。

original: There’s a reason why Steelwind is so wary of us knowing who the witness is.
translation: 斯蒂尔文德如此警惕我们知晓证人身份一定有其理由。

original: And if the witness’s family is powerful,[p/] that must mean…
translation: 如果证人的家庭十分强大，[p/]那也就意味着……

original: Tyrion: The witness has to belong to a noble family.
translation: Tyrion: 证人一定是个贵族。

original: Tyrion: That’s why she’s so wary of interference.
translation: Tyrion: 这才是她如此警惕外界干扰的原因。

original: CELESTE: But [i]we’re[/i] obviously not going to do anything corrupt.
translation: CELESTE: 但<u>我们</u>很明显不会去做任何腐败的事情啊。

original: CELESTE: Why is she hiding the witness's identity from us?
translation: CELESTE: 为什么她对我们也要隐瞒证人的身份？

original: You recall seeing a thought through the Eye.
translation: 你回想通过荷鲁斯之眼看到的思绪。

original: ARIA: …So regardless of what I said before,[p/] the answer is still “no”. [mind="Her family is dangerous." /]
translation: ARIA: ……所以说无论我之前说了什么，[p/]我的回答仍是“不行”。[mind="她的家族太危险了。" /]

original: TYRION: I think…[p/] She’s worried about our safety.
translation: TYRION: 我觉得……[p/]她是在担心我们的安危。

original: ORYM: Yeah…[p/] I guess harassing a noble could put you in danger.
translation: ORYM: 有道理……[p/]我也觉得骚扰贵族会威胁到你的生命安全。

original: ORYM: But...
translation: ORYM: 但是……

original: TYRION: I’m the protégé of the “infamous Ruby Tymora”.
translation: TYRION: 我是那个“臭名昭著的鲁比·泰摩拉”的徒弟。

original: CELESTE: Yeah.[p/] It’s not as if we aren’t already on the nobility’s bad side.
translation: CELESTE: 对啊。[p/]我们已经站在贵族的对立面上了。

original: CELESTE: I’m sure the Pierce family still has it out for us.
translation: CELESTE: 皮尔斯家肯定还对我们有很多意见。

original: TYRION: This can only mean that the family we’re dealing with is even more powerful than House Pierce.
translation: TYRION: 这只能意味着我们要应付的贵族比皮尔斯家还要强大。

original: TYRION: If the prosecutor is wary of them,[p/] they could even be as powerful as the Steelwinds.
translation: TYRION: 如果检察官都在警惕他们的话，[p/]甚至可能是和斯蒂尔文德家一样强大的家族。

original: ORYM: Wait…[p/][s/] Don’t tell me you think we’re dealing with one of the Four Pillars?!
translation: ORYM: 等下……[p/][s/]别告诉我我们是在和四大支柱家族之一作对？！

original: CELESTE: “Four Pillars”?
translation: CELESTE: “四大支柱家族”？

original: TYRION: It’s a name people use for the top four noble houses.
translation: TYRION: 是目前顶尖四大贵族的一个总称。

original: TYRION: These families stand at the top of the kingdom’s aristocracy.
translation: TYRION: 这些家族站在王国贵族的顶点。

original: TYRION: If I recall correctly,[p/] the Four Pillars are House Frega,[p/] House von Sanctus,[p/] House Sibyl,[p/] and House Steelwind.
translation: TYRION: 如果我没记错的话，[p/]四大支柱家族分别是弗雷加、[p/]冯·桑克图斯、[p/]希比尔和斯蒂尔文德。

original: Celeste: [i]Steelwind[/i] is a part of one of them?
translation: Celeste: <u>斯蒂尔文德</u>检察官也是四大支柱家族之一的成员？

original: Orym: Yeah…[p/] Which makes it [i]so[/i] much weirder that she’s serving as a prosecutor.
translation: Orym: 对啊……[p/]她选择来当一名检察官就显得<u>更</u>怪了。

original: ORYM: Hm…
translation: ORYM: 嗯……

original: TYRION: What is it?
translation: TYRION: 怎么了？

original: ORYM: Steelwind's weird behavior all started after she investigated this room.
translation: ORYM: 斯蒂尔文德在调查完这个房间之后就开始神经兮兮的。

original: ORYM: We were at the crime scene,[p/] and she left to follow a lead…
translation: ORYM: 我们当时都在犯罪现场，[p/]她却独自去调查一个线索……

original: ORYM: But an hour later,[p/] she came back to the lecture hall and booted everyone out.
translation: ORYM: 但一小时后，[p/]她回到了讲堂，把我们都轰出去了。

original: TYRION: Her behaviour changed [i]after[/i] investigating this room…
translation: TYRION: 她调查了这间屋子<u>之后</u>就变得怪怪的……

original: TYRION: That means that she found something here…
translation: TYRION: 那意味着她在这儿找到了什么……

original: CELESTE: And that “something” must point to a family from the four pillars!
translation: CELESTE: 那个“什么”一定指向四大支柱家族中的一个！

original: ORYM: …
translation: ORYM: ……

original: The commander looks a bit anxious.
translation: 指挥官看起来有点紧张。

original: ORYM: You know…[p/] Steelwind’s orders say [i]I[/i] can’t snoop around here.
translation: ORYM: 你也知道……[p/]斯蒂尔文德的命令有提到<u>我</u>不能搜索这里。

original: ORYM: But you two on the other hand…
translation: ORYM: 但你们两个就另当别论了……

original: TYRION: Don’t worry.[p/] Just leave it to us.
translation: TYRION: 别担心，[p/]交给我们吧。

original: Orym: I have some school records that say which locker belongs to which student.
translation: Orym: 我这有学校记录，写明这些储物柜属于哪些学生。

original: Orym: You can use it to tell whose locker you're looking at.
translation: Orym: 你可以用这个来分辨要找的储物柜。

original: CELESTE: We found…[p/] a few things.
translation: CELESTE: 我们发现了……[p/]一些东西。

original: CELESTE: But I can’t really make sense of any of it.
translation: CELESTE: 但我就是想不通。

original: TYRION: We should look at this from the prosecutor’s perspective.
translation: TYRION: 我们应该从检察官的角度来思考这件事。

original: TYRION: Steelwind found something in one of the lockers.
translation: TYRION: 斯蒂尔文德在某个储物柜里找到了什么东西。

original: TYRION: And whatever that was,[p/] it made her extremely paranoid.
translation: TYRION: 无论那是什么，[p/]都导致她开始极度疑神疑鬼。

original: No…[p/] You found a few strange things in each of the lockers.
translation: 不对……[p/]你在每个储物柜里都或多或少找到了些奇怪的东西。

original: But there was one thing that was suspicious, no matter how you look at it.
translation: 但其中之一无论你怎么想都十分可疑。

original: CELESTE: No matter how we look at it,[p/] we found some insanely suspicious things in Frega’s locker.
translation: CELESTE: 无论怎么看，[p/]我们都在弗雷加的储物柜里发现了些极其可疑的东西。

original: CELESTE: It had Wallace’s notebooks and even some blood.
translation: CELESTE: 里面有华莱士的笔记本，甚至有些血迹。

original: TYRION: But that blood is certainly strange.
translation: TYRION: 但那血迹很奇怪。

original: Tyrion: It implies that something bloody was stored there.
translation: Tyrion: 血迹表明有什么染血的东西曾被放在这。

original: CELESTE: Do you think someone stole it?
translation: CELESTE: 你是觉得有人把它偷走了吗？

original: TYRION: No, actually.
translation: TYRION: 并不是。

original: TYRION: I think it was Steelwind who took it.
translation: TYRION: 我认为是斯蒂尔文德把它拿走的。

original: CELESTE: Oh, right.[p/] Orym mentioned that she investigated this room.
translation: CELESTE: 哦，对了。[p/]奥蒙提到过她调查了这个房间。

original: CELESTE: She must have taken the bloody item as evidence.
translation: CELESTE: 她一定把染血的东西作为证据拿走了。

original: TYRION: But with that said,[p/] there’s something else that’s strange about Miriam Frega’s locker.
translation: TYRION: 但除此之外，[p/]米莉亚姆·弗雷加的储物柜还有其他奇怪的地方。

original: Tyrion: It had a [i]lot[/i] of Wallace’s possessions.
translation: Tyrion: 里面有<u>不少</u>华莱士的私人物品。

original: Tyrion: It’s possible that she really did steal these items from him.
translation: Tyrion: 有可能真是她从华莱士那里偷来的。

original: Tyrion: But it's more likely that this locker isn't actually hers.
translation: Tyrion: 但更站得住脚的说法还是储物柜本来就不是她的。

original: Tyrion: Remember what Wallace told us before?
translation: Tyrion: 还记得华莱士之前和我们说的吗？

original: WALLACE: Sometimes the other students would steal the id number off of my locker.
translation: WALLACE: 有时候其他学生会把我储物柜上的名牌偷走。

original: WALLACE: Then they’d switch it with the number of another locker.
translation: WALLACE: 然后与另一个储物柜的名牌对调。

original: WALLACE: They thought it was funny whenever the student who owned that locker got angry with me.
translation: WALLACE: 他们觉得看另一个储物柜的主人对我生气很有趣……

original: CELESTE: So, someone switched the nameplates?
translation: CELESTE: 所以说，是某人交换了名牌？

original: TYRION: This means that this [i]isn’t[/i] Miriam Frega’s locker.[p/] It’s Wallace’s.
translation: TYRION: 也就是说这<u>并非</u>是米莉亚姆·弗雷加的储物柜，[p/]而是华莱士的。

original: CELESTE: But that would mean that the bloody object came from [i]Wallace’s[/i] locker!
translation: CELESTE: 但这就意味着那件染血的物体来自华莱士的储物柜！

original: TYRION: It appears so…
translation: TYRION: 看来是的……

original: TYRION: But if that’s true,[p/] why didn't Steelwind present the bloody item during the trial?
translation: TYRION: 但如果这是真的，[p/]为什么斯蒂尔文德不把那件染血的物品向法庭出示呢？

original: Tyrion: I [i]proved[/i] that Bellwether was wounded before Valerie healed her.
translation: Tyrion: 我<u>证明</u>了贝尔维瑟在瓦莱丽治疗她之前受了伤。

original: Tyrion: Wouldn’t that have been the perfect time to present what she found?
translation: Tyrion: 那时候不是提交这份证据的完美时机吗？

original: Tyrion: It was a bloody item found in the [i]defendant’s[/i] locker, after all.
translation: Tyrion: 毕竟这可是在<u>被告的</u>储物柜中找到的染血物品。

original: Tyrion: She could have easily proved that the nameplates were switched too.
translation: Tyrion: 她本能轻松证明这些名牌被交换过。

original: CELESTE: Right…[p/] That [i]is[/i] weird.
translation: CELESTE: 对哦……[p/]这<u>确实</u>挺奇怪的。

original: There’s something more to this that you aren’t seeing…[p/] But what?
translation: 还有些你不知道的事情……[p/]但那是什么呢？

original: TYRION: I think we’ll just have to ask Steelwind ourselves.
translation: TYRION: 我觉得我们得亲自找斯蒂尔文德谈谈了。

Orym: It started when the city watch got a call from the Imperial Academy.[p/] Someone was attacked,[p/] and the whole building was put in lockdown.
translation: Orym: 事情从城市安保接到帝国学院的传讯开始说起。[p/]有人受到了攻击，[p/]然后整栋楼都被封锁了。

original: Orym: We set up a perimeter around the area and waited for the lockdown system to deactivate.
translation: Orym: 我们在区域周围设立了警戒线，等待封锁系统解除。

original: Orym: When we finally got into the building,[p/] the prosecutor personally inspected the body and detected traces of [b]necromancy[/b] on it.
translation: Orym: 当我们终于能进入大楼时，[p/]检察官本人检查了尸体，并探测到上面有[b]死灵术[/b]的魔法痕迹。

original: Orym: There were no cuts or bruises on the body either.[p/] The entire body was clean.
translation: Orym: 尸体上也没有创口或者瘀伤。[p/]尸体全身都非常干净。

original: Orym: With those two pieces of evidence,[p/] we concluded that it could only be the necromancer kid that did it.
translation: Orym: 依据这两个证据，[p/]我们只能认为是那个死灵法师小子干的。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Valentina: I was walking with my sister in the west wing when we noticed something in a nearby classroom.
translation: Valentina: 我当时正和我妹妹在校园西侧散步，突然看到附近的教室里有什么东西。

original: Valentina: We looked over to see what it was.[p/][s/] That's when we saw Ms. Bellwether bleeding on the ground!
translation: Valentina: 好奇心作祟，我们靠近去看到底是什么，[p/][s/]结果竟然是贝尔维瑟教授躺在血泊中！

original: Valentina: My sister tried her best to help her,[p/] but the professor had already lost a lot of blood…
translation: Valentina: 我妹妹尽全力救助她，[p/]但教授已经失血过多……

original: Valentina: She used first aid and applied pressure to her wound to stop the bleeding.
translation: Valentina: 她用医疗包来对伤口施加压力，帮助教授止血。

original: Valentina: While my sister did that,[p/] I used an emergency communication device to call for help.
translation: Valentina: 与此同时，[p/]我使用学院里的紧急通讯装置来求助。

original: Valentina: But it was too late.[p/] By the time her bleeding stopped,[p/] she’d already lost too much blood…
translation: Valentina: 但已经太迟了，[p/]止住血的时候，[p/]她已经失血太多了……

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Valentina: Like I said,[p/] my sister and I saw Ms. Bellwether bleeding on the ground.[p/] We rushed over to her. [mind="I was definitely surprised when I saw her like that."/]
translation: Valentina: 正如我说过的，[p/]妹妹和我看见贝尔维瑟女士倒在血泊之中。[p/]我们赶紧冲过去查看。[mind="看到她那个样子我确实很惊讶。"/]

original: Valentina: N-[p/]Now that you mention it…[p/] I don’t know if I saw any wounds on her.[p/] But I definitely saw blood! [mind="I can’t go back on that now… I just need to play dumb."/]
translation: Valentina: 既、[p/][s/]既然你提到了……[p/]我也不知道有没有在她身上看到伤口。[p/]但我肯定看到血了！[mind="这一点上没法回头了……我只好装傻了。"/]

original: Valentina: My sister tried to save her![p/][s/] But she didn’t use any magic! [mind="Ugh, Valerie… You’re too kind-hearted for your own good…"/]
translation: Valentina: 我妹妹尝试救助她！[p/][s/]但她没使用什么魔法！[mind="啊，瓦莱丽……你善良过头了……"/]

original: Valentina: Neither of us is a mage![p/][s/] Both of us held the book the knights gave us! [mind="I was caught off guard when they asked us. They almost found us out."/]
translation: Valentina: 我们俩都不是法师！[p/][s/]我们都碰了骑士们给的那本书！[mind="他们问的时候我有点措手不及。差点就被发现了。"/]

original: Valentina: The commander was watching us the whole time![p/][s/] He can confirm it! [mind="It’s a good thing that we’re twins… Or else that trick wouldn’t have worked."/]
translation: Valentina: 指挥官全程都在监视我们！[p/][s/]他可以作证！[mind="还好我们是双胞胎……不然这个把戏行不通的。"/]

Miriam: I was working on a research project in my dorm room when I decided to take a break.
translation: Miriam: 我当时正在自己宿舍里进行一个研究项目，然后想休息一下。

original: Miriam: I left my room and went on a walk.[p/] That’s when I saw Professor Bellwether exiting the Headmaster’s Office.
translation: Miriam: 我离开房间散了散步。[p/]那时我正好看到贝尔维瑟教授正从校长室出来。

original: Miriam: She was walking in my direction.[p/] So I greeted her and she responded in kind.
translation: Miriam: 她正好向我这边走过来，[p/]所以我向她问好，她也和蔼地回应了我。

original: Miriam: She was walking towards me.[p/] So I bid her “Good morning” and she responded in kind.
translation: Miriam: 她正好向我这边走过来，[p/]所以我向她说“上午好”，她也和蔼地回应了我。

original: Miriam: After that,[p/] she headed towards the library.
translation: Miriam: 在那之后，[p/]她直接向图书馆走了过去。

original: Miriam: A short time after that,[p/] I went back to my room and continued my work.
translation: Miriam: 又过了一小会儿，[p/]我回到宿舍继续做研究。

Jan: I saw the professor when I was cleaning the west-wing hallways.[p/] It was about 20-30 minutes before the body was discovered.
translation: Jan: 我是在清理西侧走廊的时候看到教授的，[p/]当时大概是在发现尸体的 20 到 30 分钟之前。

original: Jan: She walked by me…[p/] But she looked pretty out of it.
translation: Jan: 她从我身旁走过……[p/]但她看起来十分不正常。

original: Jan: I heard she was undead when this happened…[p/] Pretty creepy if you ask me.
translation: Jan: 事发后听说她当时已经是僵尸一样的生物了……[p/]真把我吓坏了。

original: Jan: I heard she was undead. Which is pretty creepy because she pushed me out of her way.
translation: Jan: 我听说她已经是死尸了。这事真挺吓人的，因为当时她把我推开了。

original: Jan: I heard she was undead. Which is pretty creepy because she knocked over a vase.
translation: Jan: 我听说她已经是死尸了。这事真挺吓人的，因为她当时撞倒了一个花瓶。

original: Jan: I heard she was undead. Which is pretty creepy because she yelled at me.
translation: Jan: 我听说她已经是死尸了。这事真挺吓人的，因为她当时朝我大吼大叫。

original: Jan: After that,[p/] she went into the empty classroom.
translation: Jan: 在那之后，[p/]她进了一间空教室。

Theodore: That day,[p/] I had a meeting scheduled with the professor at noon.
translation: Theodore: 那天，[p/]我和教授约好在中午见面。

original: Theodore: She showed up at the expected time,[p/] and we discussed various administrative matters.
translation: Theodore: 她准时到场，[p/]我们一起探讨了许多管理方面的事项。

original: Theodore: Our meeting went on for an hour.[p/] After which, she left.[p/] Presumably to prepare for her next class.
translation: Theodore: 我们的会谈持续了一小时，[p/]在那之后，她便离开去准备下一堂课。

original: Theodore: Despite our many disagreements,[p/] we still knew how to be civil with one another.
translation: Theodore: 虽然有许多分歧，[p/]但我们都知道尊重对方。

original: Theodore: After all,[p/] I had no reason to bear a personal grudge against her.
translation: Theodore: 毕竟，[p/]我没有理由对她怀恨在心。

original: Player: Overflow
Player: Objection
Theodore: It [i]is[/i] true that I knew about the Fregas’ plot beforehand.[p/] But I had only just learned about it.
translation: Theodore: 没错，我<u>的确</u>提前得知了弗雷加一族的计划，但也只是<u>最近</u>才知道。

original: Theodore: On the day of the murder,[p/] the professor told me about her plan.[p/] She was going to replace me as headmaster and replace the staff with her Arcane Constructs.
translation: Theodore: 案发当日，[p/]教授对我讲述了她的计划。[p/]她要代替我担任校长，用奥术构造体取代工作人员。

original: Theodore: Now you might say that this would have given me the perfect motive to murder the professor.
translation: Theodore: 各位或许会认为，这正好是我谋杀教授的动机。

original: Theodore: However,[p/] the supposed murder weapon was stolen from Ms. Frega.[p/] This happened weeks before the murder.
translation: Theodore: 然而，[p/]这把据称的凶器是弗雷加女士那里偷来的。[p/]这是谋杀案发生数周之前的事。

original: Theodore: I had no knowledge of their plan before she told me.[p/] And therefore,[p/] I wouldn’t have known to steal Ms. Frega’s weapon in an attempt to frame her.
translation: Theodore: 她告诉我之前，我并不知道他们的计划，[p/]更遑论为了陷害弗雷加女士，专门偷走她的武器了。
